name: Glover: Collector's Edition
description: The Kingdom's peaceful world has been shattered! The wizard, while mixing potions with his magical gloves has caused a huge explosion, turning him instantly to stone and dislodging the seven crystals that give the Kingdom its energy. Without the crystals, the castle and its world will fall apart and the wizard will be lost!

name: Dare to Stay
description: In the town of Redstone, Pennsylvania, an evil returns striking chaos that once targeted families in the 1950s. Detective Alasdair, a successful investigator is reassigned and is forced to relive the haunting cases of his past.

name: Humdle
description: You're in a dark room. you have to escape from here but.. can't see anything!!

name: Classic Memory Game
description: Classic Memory Game is a game of memorization skills, designed for the entire family and suitable for people of all ages. It is inspired by the popular game of pairs where the player requires concentration and memory.

name: PieceWars
description: "Piece Wars" is a chess-based board game. Use the unique skills of each piece to win!

name: Nakana Bundle 2: Mythic Ocean + Journey of the Broken Circle + Cosmic Top Secret
description: Experience our meaningful games! In Bundle 2, you'll explore these themes: Love, Discord, Influence, Introspection

name: Famished Zombies: Decisive Extermination
description: Famished Zombies: Decisive Extermination is a Third-Person Survival Shooter based on Apocalypse days where Zombies are spawned each time when you finish a wave, the more waves you will play , the harder it will be. Play it in multiplayer mode to compete with others players.

name: Dismantled Director's Cut
description: Experience the game in its best form with the Director's Cut Edition. New graphics, new enemies, more weapons, more blood...

name: Whisper Books
description: Whisper Books is a visual novel game of plot quality signature, embellished with illustrations, dubbing and interactive options. Whisper Books resembles a mini library of stories. Players can vote for new story auditions and winners will be developed into expansion packs.

name: The Twilight of Infinity
description: Anyone with a time machine can change history, but saving it requires creative problem solving. Pocket sized episodes based on the greatest unsolved mysteries; solve, manipulate, interrogate and impersonate. The only thing you don't have to worry about with time travel is being late.

name: Ultimate Starfighter
description: An unknown Alien Race has launched a failed attack on Earth Station Alpha and are regrouping! Fight off the incoming fleets, discover where their ships are being constructed, and launch an assault! If Earth Station Alpha is destroyed, the planet will be lost and humanity exterminated.

name: F1 22
description: Race the stunning, new cars of the Formula 1 2022 season with the authentic lineup of all 20 drivers and 10 teams, and take control of your race experience with new immersive or cinematic race sequences. Test your skills around the new Miami International Autodrome, and get a taste of the glitz and glamour in F1 Life. Create a team and take them to the front of the grid with new depth in the acclaimed My Team career mode, race head-to-head in split-screen or multiplayer, or change the pace by taking supercars from some of the sport’s biggest names to the track.

name: Mini Island: Cosmos
description: Mini Island: Cosmos is a one small hold & Gun, boss Rush mini-game of Casual difficulty!

name: Pirate Souls
description: A 2D Online RPG where you can become the most wanted pirate, the strongest bounty hunter or even the highest-ranking Marine! Customize your character to be uniquely yours, level up and find treasures. Start your adventure in the world of Pirate Souls now!

name: Zombie Night Terror: Collector's Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Sycamore
description: Sycamore is a new 3D platformer under development based around quick, fast-paced movement where you will race to the end of a level to compete in leaderboard times with players from around the world.

name: Onslaught 2D
description: Onslaught is an online 2D multiplayer, zombie survival shooter featuring endless amounts of customization & content, and takes a whole new meaning to the word depth. From economy trading to player created customization, every player is unique in the dead world known as Irithium.

name: Stream Toys by Zokya
description: A collection of chat-interactive games and toys that you can use to engage with your live-streaming audience.

name: Numina
description: Step through the 4th wall… into the world of NUMINA! An exciting adventure that fuses many classic RPG aspects, a character-driven story with player choices, a dynamic battle system, puzzles and towns waiting to be explored and other exciting locations.

name: Popgoes Arcade
description:
Popgoes is an official Five Nights at Freddy's spinoff series, produced by Scott Cawthon and developed by fans as part of the "Fazbear Fanverse Initiative".

In Popgoes Arcade you'll play through two RPG campaigns: "Popgoes: The Dead Forest" (originally released for free in 2020) and "Popgoes and The Machinist" (a built-in sequel for the paid release!). These fun, colourful, and mysterious adventures will introduce you to new characters like Popgoes the Weasel and Manora the Mouse, but with no attention taken from classic FNaF characters like Chica the Chicken and Foxy the Pirate.

name: To Your Stations!
description: To Your Stations! is a couch co-op spaceship management game where you work with your friends to crew a spaceship to fight off asteroids, aliens, and other deep space entities. Choose from several ships, each with their own unique mechanics, and a selection of vibrant characters.

name: Fire Emblem: New Theory of Thracia 776
description: Sin descripción

name: Fate Seeker: Mission
description: Fate Seeker: Mission has launched its first Martial Art mobile game, offering millions of players an opportunity to create their own skill combinations and unify the world with authentic Martial Art. The game is a Roguelite Combat that offers stress-free mode with player's own choices at the tip of their fingers. Upgrade your champions idling and enjoy casual, fun, and exciting battles over a series of adventures

name: Gent Stickman vs Evil Meat Hand
description:
Interactive Fiction Parser Game WITHOUT TEXT, just hand drawing graphics.

Short, minimalist, difficult puzzles, full of help.

name: Travellers Road
description: An otome visual romance novel about being stuck on a cart for three weeks with your two squabbling party members.

name: Void Terrarium 2: Limited Edition
description:
The Limited Edition includes:
- The Deluxe Edition of the game
- "Terrarium Tunes" 1-disc Official Soundtrack
- "Growing Together" Acrylic Standee
- "Friendly Faces" Art Card
- Collector's Box

name: Deepspace
description:
DEEPSPACE is an innovative Web3 strategy exploration MMO set in an expansive space environment. It integrates a sophisticated economy system using DPS, its native in-game token, along with NFT-based assets, providing players with genuine ownership of their in-game assets. The game is structured into multiple distinct stages, each offering a unique gaming experience, with The Hangar serving as the gateway to the vast DEEPSPACE universe.

Players in DEEPSPACE embark on a journey of purchasing, trading, and upgrading spaceships, fostering a dynamic interstellar experience. The game places a strong emphasis on exploration, inviting players to uncover the mysteries of genesis planets and various other aspects of its rich universe. The gameplay is diverse, ranging from resource mining to engaging in tactical battles against AI opponents and fellow players. Key features include strategic turn-based combat, the formation of alliances, and the expansion of territorial influence.

Operating on both the Ethereum and BNB Chain, DEEPSPACE adopts a gamefi model, blending gaming with decentralized finance. This model enhances the gameplay experience by offering economic incentives. The DEEPSPACE multiverse is a carefully crafted blend of exploration, resource gathering, and combat, ensuring an engaging and multifaceted experience for players.

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Canvas of Stars
description:
Version 5.8 of Honkai Impact 3rd, which includes:
• New Valkyrie: Starry Impression
• New Story Chapter XXX: Marcia Funebre
• New Featured Event: The Journey of Painting Stars
• ...and more!

name: Party Project
description:
Party Project compiles boards, items, and mechanics from Mario Party, and minigames from multiple sources to create an ultimate-esque game.

With options like Item Toggles, Minigame Toggles, and Bonus Star Multipliers, among many others, you can customize matches however you'd like!

name: Fire on the Mountain
description: Fire on the Mountain is a 5 map limit-removing episode for Doom II and is my first proper mapset. Difficulty is slightly above Doom II, so this WAD should be fairly easy going.

name: Goose vs. Marine Apocalypse
description: A Goose Fighting a Marine Apocalypse! Kill the shrimp enemies and level up and get upgrades.

name: ImpliCations
description: The local island of cats needs your help building their city. Make houses, parks, and government buildings, then help them manage the ethical dilemmas that occur on the island. Save your island, snap a photo, and share it with your friends.

name: Cybersecurity Ethics Scavenger Hunt
description: An educational, interactive 'I Spy' game. Visit locations, find objects, and solve ethical dilemmas using your cybersecurity experience.

name: Army Defence
description: It’s a desperate mission that only the brave and resourceful will survive: Your base is under attack and the enemy are pressing in on all sides. Only you and your tiny squad of special forces operatives can save the day, so parachute in and prepare to defend using everything you can get your hands on in this all-action tower defense game.

name: Omniheroes
description: Omniheroes is a valkyries fantasy casual strategy RPG that is now available in the Philippines, Indonesia, Australia, New Zealand, Malaysia, Singapore,etc. Pre-register now to receive great rewards in the future.

name: Little Cities: Hand Tracking Update
description: The most loved city creator just got cozier with hand tracking. Let go of your controllers and discover a whole new way to play, crafting your little city with simple gestures that puts cozy creation, literally, at your fingertips.

name: Loop Dungeon
description: An idle RPG dungeon-crawler with a focus on strategy, loot, and offline automation.

name: Monster Hunter Rise: DLC Pack 5
description: Monster Hunter Rise DLC Pack 5

name: 3 Seasons
description: A slice of life, romance and fantasy dating sim featuring 3 love interests, romance/friendship routes and an original soundtrack.

name: Void Terrarium 2: Deluxe Edition
description:
Deluxe Edition includes:
- The Game
- Digital Soundtrack (download code)
- Softcover Art book

name: The Jig Is Up!
description: From the fans that brought you Is Lupin Still Flirting, comes another tale of master thief Lupin the Third, as he sets his sights on cool gunman Jigen Daisuke. Keep social stats balanced as you help Lupin win over Jigen’s trust, without getting Jigen fed up with Lupin's constant BS.

name: Platform Adventure
description: A relaxing, cozy, combat-free platformer featuring puzzles, secrets and loot!

name: Hatsune Miku Connecting Puzzle Tamagotori: Kagamine Rin / Len Happy 14th Birthday
description:
The new stages have "Kagamine Rin / Len Happy 14th Birthday" themed eggs, birds, and berries!

Collect exclusive berries in new stages to find special birds and birds with limited items!
Exclusive egg designs and special events for this stage...!?

name: Hiddens Awakening
description: The Howler Hidden, regains consciousness in the forest, and discovers that his world has changed. Can you save the Hiddens from extinction, organize the resistance, and get the situation under control ? Become the ruthless shadow of the forests in this turn-based strategy game with no chance

name: Cuphead & The Delicious Last Course
description: A second helping of Cuphead action awaits on a brand new Inkwell Isle filled with boss battles, secrets, and adventure galore!

name: Pitstop in Purgatory
description: Astrid wakes up in Purgatory and has to make peace with her death. Only problem is... she doesn't remember anything! Point and click your way through adventure based gameplay mixed with visual novel storytelling, and solve the mystery of our heroine's untimely demise.

name: Ceke Ceke
description: Ceke Ceke is an awesome game for learning typing without looking at the keyboard. If you want to type like a 'pro' than this game is for you!

name: Monster Hunter Rise + Sunbreak: Deluxe Edition
description: Experience Monster Hunter Rise and its massive expansion Monster Hunter Rise: Sunbreak in one convenient set!

name: Jurassic World: Primal Ops
description: Rescue, collect, and fight alongside your favorite dinosaurs in Jurassic World: Primal Ops, a thrilling top-down action-adventure game with a deep dinosaur collection system. As a battle-trained dinosaur handler, use your expertise and combat skills to save dinosaurs from malicious mercenaries, deadly poachers, and sinister laboratories. Collect, build a roster to deploy in battle, and help your new companions safely find their place in a primal world.

name: Sine
description: Control a sine wave and avoid obstacles in more than 40 levels. Sine is a competitive arcade game with unique mechanics and compelling visuals. You control a sine wave, avoiding obstacles, racing to the finish, and collecting orbs scattered throughout the levels.

name: Alien Engine
description: Sin descripción

name: Best of Merge Vol #2
description: Sin descripción

name: The Maze Game: Runner and Escapist
description: The Maze Game: Runner and Escapist is an addictive game that updates a classic formula for players of this era. Slide and guide the dot through the maze but, beware! Time is running fast.

name: UFS League
description: Man vs Robots in the $1 000 000 fight of the evening. Smash hundreds of robots in 12 rounds. Collect bonuses and destroy with the power of god's finger. Not enough? Activate thunder and feel the power of destruction. Rent weapons and eliminate enemies.

name: Incoherence
description: Incoherence is a fragmented first-person point and click mystery game. Enter the mind of Jason Bethlam as you awake to a brightly lit room. Piece together fragments of your life and escape.

name: Indigo Loop
description: Indigo Loop is a quick-count, time management puzzle game with a splash of strategy and luck. It shares the classic puzzle game spirit of being easy to pick up and challenging to master.

name: Fungiman
description: Just a game about a friendly fungus. There's nothing wrong, is it?

name: Tempusia
description: Based on rewinding time mechanics, Tempusia is the puzzle platformer requiring a big cold head :3

name: Monster Hunter Rise + Sunbreak
description: Experience Monster Hunter Rise and its massive expansion Monster Hunter Rise: Sunbreak in one convenient set!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Pro Train Class 68 DRS
description: The Class 68 is a type of mainline mixed traffic diesel-electric locomotive manufactured by Stadler Rail (and previously by Vossloh España) for Direct Rail Services (DRS) in the United Kingdom.

name: Hummingbird's Crown
description:
Wren is a hardworking book editor who has recently turned 30 and begins to ruminate about her life.

‘What does it mean to be an adult? Why does my job make me feel incomplete? Why do I feel like I don't fit anywhere?'

Her only solace is gaming and her small group of 2 online friends, Kanaria and Lonan, who she sometimes chats and plays with.

On May 31st, taking advantage of an upcoming long weekend, Kanaria suggests they should finally meet in person at the upcoming GameCon, a medium-sized local game event from Solstice City.

Unfortunately, the day of the event itself, a terrible accident happens at the Eon Building, the place where it's being held. Wren panics and doesn't know what to do until... huh?

Why is it suddenly May 31st again? Did she just go back in time?!

name: Fallen London: Dernier Cri
description: "Dernier Cri" is add-on for Fallen London, a browser-based choose-your-own-adventure game set in "Fallen London", an alternative Victorian London with gothic overtones. "Dernier Cri" was originally the Exceptional Story for July, 2022.

name: Mythic Meetup
description: An unsuspecting human in search of a little more spice to their life, you have just followed a mysterious email link to ... a server of real life mythical creatures? Well, this wasn't quite the dating pool you had in mind, but some of them have definitely got their eye on you!

name: Tryp FPV
description: TRYP FPV is a drone FPV Simulator. This game has been created to give the most realistic and complete drone FPV piloting experience to everyone : beginners to pro.

name: Where's Oswald?
description: A short horror experience taking place in a dream or a memory.

name: Arcade Archives: Thunder Ceptor
description: "Thunder Ceptor" is a shooter released by Namco in 1986. Your mission is to safely return to the Federation Base through the energy corridors that connect star systems.

name: Wandering in Space
description: In the cosmic space station scene, players will take on the role of “amnesiac special soldier” from a first-person perspective, embarking on the bloodthirsty road’s growth, struggle and adventure.

name: Error143
description: A bickering and bantering rivals-to-lovers visual novel.

name: Zugzwang
description:
Desire is a labyrinth. As a sex angel, you must help mankind meet each other in the neon darkness. Drink deep their juices, distill their pleasure into divinity. The absence of the witch does not invalidate the spell.

A gay chess-puzzle game inspired by sex magic, the history of censorship in the US, architecture, and the poetry of Emily Dickinson.

name: Bug Dates
description:
Just like bugs, this game is cute, creepy, and a little bit eerie.

Lonely? Don't worry! Your best friend signs you up for a dating show without your permission. The fun part you're gonna date some bugs! Have fun!

name: I'm on Cirno Duty
description:
This is a fangame based on the I'm On Observation Duty Series by Notovia/Zaster, created with their permission, made for and themed after Twitch streamer Cirno_TV. Please support the original I'm On Observation Duty series on Steam, iOS and Android.

Like in the original games, you have to check live surveillance footage to detect and report anomalies by type and location, which can be anything from a room's door opening, to the sudden presence of strange intruders.

The difference in this game is that a lot of the anomalies are either generic memes or Cirno_TV community-related jokes/references. Originally a private project, the game became public after a significant amount of interest was shown from audiences.

name: Quantum Bummer Blues
description: Escape from space prison, smash atoms, chase high scores, and paint pretty pictures with the river of your blood.

name: Clown For Speed
description: Clown For Speed is your chance to immerse yourself in the real world of ultimate drifting experience. Pick your perfect ride and get ready to burn some tires!

name: Apocalyptic
description: Apocalyptic is a Zombie Survival Shooter Video Game. It begins in a church where zombies flood everywhere. There are survival quests as you proceed through the campaigns and you must try and survive the apocalyptic horde.

name: Magic and Elements
description: Magic and elements is a 2D arena shooter, you are the greatest magician of all time, you pass another test, getting into the arena of the four elements

name: Cookies Cookies Cookies
description: Cookies Cookies Cookies is a 2d runner made in pixel style.

name: Ball Torture
description: Ball Torture is a 2d puzzle game where you control a bowling ball, and once again you get into the recycling compartment and try to get out.

name: Black Wolf
description: Take the role of the titular Black Wolf as you run, jump, dash and wall slide through side-scrolling stages collecting bones and trying to survive!

name: Exfiltrator: Cyber Stealth Missions
description: Exfiltrator: Cyber Stealth Missions features 30+ levels full of retro stealth action. Evade guards, dodge cameras, and solve puzzles to become the ultimate cyber agent. Your performance will be ranked and rewarded with achievements and unlocks.

name: Ground Divers
description: In Ground Divers has players guiding the rabbit-like mining robot Tsuruhashi into increasingly complex mine shafts of their own creation. They'll be digging for "rare" matter as well as battling underground enemies, building Pit Relay Systems to help offer upgrades and supporting units along the way, and more.

name: The Galactic Junkers
description: Become the space captain you always wanted to be. There are just a few problems, your ship needs work, there’s a price on your head, and your crew are idiots. Seek your fortune and the truth in The Galactic Junkers, a comedic space combat adventure game.

name: Wands Alliances
description: Wands Alliances is a 3v3, competitive, team-based, multiplayer VR gaming experience where players engage in fast-paced magic duels. Select your class, choose your spells, and take the fight to the streets. Taste sweet victory by completing your team’s objectives or eliminating the opposing team. But duck and dodge too slowly, and the only thing you’ll be eating are fireballs.

name: Ukraine Defense Force Tactics
description:
Ukraine Defense Force Tactics is a turn-based tactics game in which you lead a small force of Ukrainian units fighting against a seemingly endless deluge of Russian invaders. You will have to outsmart and outmaneuver an overwhelming force of enemies using combined infantry-and-armor tactics and an array of special Stratagems.
Your goal is to destroy as many enemies as possible before needing to retreat your forces. By defeating enemies you gain Glory which then can be used to upgrade your units and unlock new ones.

name: Pixel Survivors: Roguelike
description: A rogue-lite game where you must face hundreds of monsters with increasingly difficult bosses that strong enough to take you down. Choose your abilities, build your favorite combat style, become stronger and survive as long as you can!

name: Just Another Runner
description: Take a quick enigmatic run up memory lane. Don't even think about slowing down, 'cause the present surely won't.

name: Veggie Menace
description: After a failed spell during a vegetable contest in the Middle Ages, the vegetables come to life and try to invade the civilization. A little witch with her magic powers will need to fight against this invasion.

name: Die, A.I
description: You must stay alive in this horror/puzzle space adventure. Survive the vengeful A.I system that has taken over the ship and killed everyone else onboard. Use your limited oxygen supply and cunning to overcome the failing systems and A.I created booby traps. Explore the ship...and don't die.

name: Explosion
description: An indie puzzle game based on satisfying explosions and an exciting story. Use your wits to solve levels with varying TNTs and progress through the fun and exciting story of Amber, you, and the Corporation!

name: Monster Hunter Rise: Sunbreak - Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: The Immortal
description: This is running game in 2D Platformer, enemies will appear on the way, kill them all if you want to reach the end of the land, Lung Cu. You have to focus on the game 100%, just one hit of enemy everything will back to the beginning.

name: Mage Noir
description: Mage Noir is a strategy card game. Become true Mages and fight with the power of the elements. Craft your spells and make good use of the shared Mana pool to defeat your opponent.

name: Outriders: Worldslayer
description:
With new horrors to challenge you and new weapons, mods and gear to discover, you’ll be further developing your build through the new PAX hybrid branch class trees.

Survive the campaign and you’ll face even greater horrors in the Trials of Tarya Grata, the brand new endgame. Which partnered with Ascension Points offers a new long term progression system for the most committed players.

Finally, push hard through the new Apocalypse difficulty tiers, with each step up to level 40 increasing the chances of obtaining incredible Apocalypse gear and its game changing third mod slot.

name: My Universe: Green Adventure - Farmer Friends
description:
Become an environmentally friendly farmer! Explore your farm's surroundings, clear your overgrown fields and find a new way to fertilize your crops. Roll up your sleeves and get ready to dig and water your crops regularly to reap the fruits of your labor. Be sure to follow the complete production cycle of a green farmer! Every day is an adventure thanks to the different quests.
Make some animal friends! During your adventure, you will be in charge of the entire farmyard, cows, hens, goats, sheep, ducks, and more. You'll have to renovate various buildings to home your new companions. Care for them, show them plenty of affection and have fun with them thanks to the many mini games.
Meet the villagers' needs! The further you progress in your adventure, the larger your choice of seeds will get. Flowers, fruits and vegetables, pay close attention to the villagers' orders to be sure to meet their needs. With a little creativity you will improve your recipes and create new flavors for your yogurts, jams, etc. It's up to you to show off your local production and your traditional recipes to the village's inhabitants!

name: Burial Stone
description: A VR tile based dungeon crawl. Delve into a dark horrifying dungeon, with weird creatures and unexpected danger. Use spells, skills and weapons to traverse the dangers.

name: The Ghost Ship
description: Psychological horror game based on an old cursed ghost ship. Navigate the town of Hollow Point, and the accursed ship while trying to keep from going insane. Run, hide, and fight your way through the undead and save the town from a curse that has plagued Hollow Point for centuries.

name: Infinity Souls
description: Infinity Souls is an all new magical girl sci-fi IP from Tsuzuki Masaki - creator of Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha, set in a dark future where PSYber crimes have taken over.

name: Void Terrarium 2
description: From the developers at Nippon Ichi Software comes the second installment of the Void Terrarium series! With cloudAI defeated and Toriko saved from certain demise, a new deadly disease threatens her well-being once more. To save her, join Robbie and venture into the past to identify a remedy.

name: Morphcat Games Collection 1
description:
The Morphcat Games Collection 1 features 3 fantastic 8-bit indie games including Micro Mages, Böbl and Spacegulls, plus standalone expansion Micro Mages: Second Quest and the Super Bat Puncher Demo.

- Micro Mages
- Böbl
- Spacegulls
- Micro Mages: Second Quest (untagged)
- Super Bat Puncher Demo.

name: MetaGods
description: MetaGods is the next generation Play-to-Earn Action Massively Multiplayer Online RPG. Earn epic NFT loot by exploring dungeons and slaying mythical monsters. Bring along your friends from any Metaverse and earn even more rewards.

name: This House
description: A hand drawn, creepy puzzle, RPG adventure. Will you be able to escape this House?

name: Salaryman Shi
description: Traverse colorful environments, battle strange animals and master the power of your suitcases to... get to work on time? Play as salaryman Takeshi Shi as you hurry to catch the bus to the office!

name: Eve: Ghost Enemies - Limited Edition
description:
This game follows the story of its two protagonists: Kojirou Amagi and Marina Houjou, as they pursue the truth behind another mystery.

This edition includes the following:
- EVE ghost enemies
- Original Drawing Collection

name: Eve: Ghost Enemies
description: This game follows the story of its two protagonists: Kojirou Amagi and Marina Houjou, as they pursue the truth behind another mystery.

name: hexceed: Illumina Pack
description: This DLC unlocks a brand new world for hexceed: Illumina! Puzzle your way through 110 brand new levels - each with an exciting new mechanic!

name: The Lord of the Parties
description: The lord of the parties is a brand new game that combines an RPG with a party shoot 'em up. Explore this unique fantasy world with your own allies!

name: I Deserve a Happy Ending
description: Play as a prince as he attempts to give his story a happy ending by finding love and claiming his place as the rightful heir of the throne in this fantasy Boys' Love visual novel.

name: Light Nite
description: Light Nite is a multiplayer third person shooter with in-game rewards and a minimalistic low-poly & cartoonish design offering several game modes like team deathmatch or a battle-royale game mode for soloQ and squads teamplay.

name: Airtight
description: Airtight is a plot-oriented third person 3D puzzle game. The player must manipulate the heroine Yiyi to escape from her closed inner world, and at the same time, follow the occasional prompts to solve various puzzles to obtain clues to escape.

name: Intellivision Collection 2
description:
The Intellivision Collection 2 cartridge for Evercade features 12 beloved Intellivision games, including the legendary role-playing game Tower of Doom and classic dungeon crawler Cloudy Mountain.

- Tower of Doom
- Cloudy Mountain (untagged)
- Hover Force
- Star Strike
- Vectron
- Auto Racing
- Stadium Mud Buggies
- Motocross
- Mountain Madness Super Pro Skiing
- Super Pro Decathlon
- Sharp Shot
- Reversi

name: Cuphead: The Delicious Last Course
description: In Cuphead: The Delicious Last Course, Cuphead and Mugman are joined by Ms. Chalice for a DLC add-on adventure on a brand new island! With new weapons, new charms, and Ms. Chalice's brand new abilities, take on a new cast of multi-faceted, screen-filling bosses to assist Chef Saltbaker in Cuphead's final challenging quest.

name: Cursed Place
description:
Down the moor, there's a cursed place. Don't wander there if you cherish your life.

Cursed Place is a Visual Novel made in two parts. The first part was made for the 2022 Amare Jam in the span of the month of April. The second was finished during the month of May 2022.

name: Afterlife Airlines
description: Help Jules look for his cat Parsnip, in the airport between Life and Death!

name: Hero of Minotaurs
description: Hero of Minotaurs is a story of how one injured hero accidentally encounters many friendly minotaur...

name: From the Psychothread
description:
You are Jeanne Delacroix, an awakened prisoner.
Your prison cell has just been opened and you don't know why.
Explore the prison, understand what is happening, fight and survive.
You must free yourself.

name: Serenade
description: A vanilla Doom 2 megawad consisting of 32 maps. Following the same basic premise as Silence, I intend to replace the original game in the style of Doom 2 the Way Id Did, but with that in mind I think it's still important to note that this gets a fair bit harder than Silence and Doom 2.

name: Afterline Airlines
description: Help Jules look for his cat Parsnip, in the airport between Life and Death!

name: Dragon Blaze
description: Dragon Blaze is a vertical-scrolling shooter game that first appeared in arcades in 2000. The heroes are the four dragon riders. Attack using normal shots, bombs, magic shots, and powerful close-range dragon shots.

name: Quiz Minister
description: Sin descripción

name: Birb Race
description: Race to be the fastest Birb in the world! Train your walking, climbing, gliding and swimming in 4 training games to improve yourself in the racing arena! Earn seeds to buy upgrades and unlock trophies to show off your skill!

name: Feartress
description: Feartress is an incremental fantasy RPG where you gather resources, build structures and hire workers and armies to help you succeed in battle and take over multiple dimensions.

name: Dreamland
description: Boy and Suicide Day and Dream Universe

name: Grindshift
description: Grindshift is a stylized hoverboard game with ramps, rails and jumps. There are no gameplay objectives or unlockables, just endless hoverboard riding and score counting.

name: Tochi II: Senshi
description:
Tochi II: Senshi is set in an abandoned settlement filled with traps that was once home to The Knights of Senshi!

Explore the Senshi settlement with your mysterious companion Amori! But be careful of the monsters that will strike you down the moment they see you! And if you die it's game over!

name: The Jackbox Party Starter
description: Get the party started with The Jackbox Party Starter! Featuring three updated titles: Quiplash 3, Trivia Murder Party 2 and Tee K.O., this starter pack is sure to entertain!

name: Ghostrunner: Complete Edition
description: Adapt, overcome and kill in the challenging but rewarding Ghostrunner: Complete Edition, the ultimate Ghostrunner experience, which includes the critically acclaimed Ghostrunner, Project _Hel expansion and all cosmetic packs.

name: Evertwine
description:
Evertwine is a free to play trading card game that uses blockchain technology which means that you actually own the cards you play with.

Whether you are learned in the ways of blockchain mechanics and card games or are just a novice, there is a place for you here. The rich world of the game will keep you entranced while you find your own path through it.

Collect cards, battle, and trade with other players. And the best part of it – paywalls will not stop you from experiencing the full scope of the game.

name: The Basketball B
description: Dribble the ball to become the best baller in the world.

name: Cyber Blades
description: Cyber blades is a game where you fight back by slicing the enemy projectile with a melee weapon in a synthwave setting. It provides a unique experience that allows you to face hundreds of enemy archers with melee weapons. Slash arrows more powerfully, and get a higher score by cutting in a row!

name: Thrill Penguin
description: crazy parkour game with No cycles, No texts, No complicated weird mechanics, Just have fun and get the thrill now !!

name: Superola: Champion Edition
description: A challenging runner-style platforming adventure, in which you’ll have to guide a burger loving llama in its quest to defeat the Hotdog Aliens and recover the stolen hamburgers... before they get cold!

name: Hook 2
description: Relaxing puzzles. This time with extra dimension.

name: Ragdolls Playground: The Sandbox
description: Ragdolls Playground is a simple Physics Sandbox game where you can Build, Paint, Destroy, Drive cars, Simulate Wars or crush ragdolls in a large open space and watch them fight with the wobbliest physics system. There aren't any predefined aims or goals. We give you the tools and leave you to play.

name: World War Armies
description:
World War Armies is the ultimate PvP real-time strategy game. Command advanced war machines and compete for free against other players worldwide. Revolutionary mechanics reduce downtime and focus on direct engagement with the enemy, you get to the fun parts of RTS faster.

Dive into a gripping cross-platform real-time strategy experience, navigating through a turbulent gaming landscape. Build up your unit deck, command advanced war machines, outsmart your foes, and forge your legacy in the gaming world.

name: Hardcore Cruising: A Sci-Fi Gay Sex Cruise!
description: Crewman Milo Barre has started work on his first gay sex cruise. He always dreamed of working for this illustrious cruise line, but his big brother bullied him by saying he would never be slutty enough to make it. Can Milo prove him wrong and be the sluttiest cabin boy on the ship?

name: Monster Hunter Rise: Sunbreak
description:
Monster Hunter Rise: Sunbreak is an expansion to the original Monster Hunter Rise.

Featuring improved gameplay and nimble-feeling additions to combat mechanics, unique new monsters and hunting locales, and a new difficulty level in the form of Master Rank quests.

As the hunter who saved Kamura from calamity, you must now journey to the far-off reaches of Elgado, an outpost near a Kingdom beset by a sinister new nemesis—the elder dragon Malzeno!

name: Zombie Groove
description: Zombie Groove will challenge your sense of rhythm. Focus on the groove of the music to get into the correct flow, and enjoy the best upbeat rhythm you've never experienced.

name: 512 Linedefs of /vr/
description: 512 Linedefs of /vr/ is a 32-map community megawad for Doom II designed for Boom-compatible source ports by various members of 4chan's retro videogames board, led by MacGuffin and released on the Doomworld forums on June 28, 2022. It is a restriction-based project inspired by similar /vr/ projects (such as 200 Minutes of /vr/ and 2048 Units of /vr/). Mappers were limited to creating maps with no more than 512 linedefs.

name: Azure Moon
description: A large base-themed map inspired by Half-Life 1 / Black Mesa with a ton of blue and green lighting, hence the name. The author's first release.

name: Zombie Defense
description: Reinforce the barricades, pick up a weapon and destroy the approaching wave of zombies!

name: MX vs. ATV Legends: KTM Pack
description:
Start your engines! Purchase the KTM Pack and experience real off-road riding!
This pack includes the following vehicles:

KTM 125 SX MX
KTM 250 SX MX
KTM 250 SX-F MX
KTM 450 SX-F MX
KTM 250 SX ATV

name: Tales of Sector 1
description: In a world overtaken by a deadly virus, you are a recruit with a crucial mission: to stop the infection from spreading to the lower sectors. But your task is not as simple as it seems. You will face moral dilemmas, unexpected challenges and diverse characters along the way. Your choices will shape the story and the destiny of the town.

name: Fall Guys: Popping Whizzbanger Pack
description:
Dazzle your opponents with this candied apple, perfect for any sweet-toothed stumbler!

Bundle Includes:
Popping Whizzbanger (Whole Costume)
600 x Show-Bucks

name: Angry Neighbor: The Strange House
description:
You should reveal neighbor's secrets... but it will not be so easy because, he knows that he entered his house.

Go into the neighbor's house and find neighbor's secrets but try not to be seen.

name: MX vs. ATV: Legends - Icon Pack
description:
The biggest edition in the MX vs ATV franchise history, only available for a limited time!

Icon Pack Details:
- 22 extra tracks scheduled for release in 2022
- 36 OEM vehicles from Honda, Husqvarna, Kawasaki, KTM, Polaris, Suzuki and Yamaha
- Exclusive customization pack for your rider and rides

name: MX vs. ATV: Legends - Honda Pack
description:
Start your engines! Purchase the Honda Pack and experience real off-road riding!
This pack includes the following vehicles:

Honda CR 125R MX
Honda CR 250R MX
Honda CR-F250 MX
Honda CR-F450 MX
Honda TRX450R ATV

name: MX vs. ATV: Legends - Yamaha Pack
description:
Start your engines! Purchase the Yamaha Pack and experience real off-road riding!
This pack includes the following vehicles:

Yamaha YZ250F MX
Yamaha YZ450F MX
Yamaha YZ250 MX
Yamaha YZ450 MX
Yamaha YFZ450R ATV
Yamaha YFZ450R SE ATV

name: WWE 2K22: Clowning Around Pack
description: The Clowning Around Pack features Doink the Clown, Ronda Rousey, Rick Boogs, Mr. T, Doudrop, and The British Bulldog. Each playable Superstar also comes with their own Evo MyFaction card.

name: Anno 1800: Industrial Zone Pack
description: The Anno 1800 Industrial Zone Pack adds over 20 new ornaments to proclaim the constantly evolving spirit of your city.

name: Jumbo Airport Story
description:
Make your fledgling airport into a world-famous international landmark jam-packed with entertainment!
First build facilities such as Bistros and Bookstores to make visitors comfortable.
Satisfied customers make your airport more popular, and will attract even more visitors!
But the bigger your airport gets, the more tired visitors will be from walking around...
Still, never fear! Simply place seating like Benches and Sofas near facilities, and visitors will be able to rest up.

name: Gyeourui Tap
description: A text Roguelike RPG set in the dark fantasy world. Start an adventure to save mankind against the endless winter.

name: A Game with a Kitty 1 & Darkside Adventures
description: Foil a little nerd's world domination plans with Kittey in A Game with a Kitty 1 and help a grumpy little Archchancellor solve a mystery in Darkside Adventures! And as a bonus, the collection also features Treasure Hunter Man 1.

name: Night Detective: Decrepit Manor
description: Night Detective: Decrepit Manor is a retro styled and retro inspired point-and-click adventure. Solve the mystery of the Decrepit Manor by following clues, examining objects, and finding new items to help you through the manor.

name: Galaxy Arena
description: Galaxy Arena Space Battle is an addicting, space war strategy game. Join us in this space odyssey & be part of the guards of galaxy who are protecting the starcitizens in this huge intergalactic space war. Build your starship armada with dreadnoughts & other spaceships. Equip your armada with anti matter, engines & interstellar weapons to protect your space men & starcitizens in your frontier. Enjoy adjustable 3D view of the space war/ battle. Battle against other players in ship vs ship idle combat.

name: Three Kingdoms: Hero Wars
description: Hundreds of Legendary Heroes, Explore An Epic World.

name: Squish
description: A spoopy, squishy, and fast-paced party game where you and up to three gooey friends rave it up in an underground crypt as it collapses down on you. You must push blocks, dodge, and jump to survive the rave and squish your opponents.

name: Quadratic Puzzle 5
description: "Quadratic puzzle 5" is an erotic puzzle game.

name: A Game That Saves the Muscles Caught in the Ceiling of the Gymnasium
description: This is a new type of shooting game in which the player rescues muscular trapped in the ceiling of a gymnasium by hitting them with a ball.

name: Power Strife Deathmatch
description:
Power Strife Deathmatch is a game with all the hallmarks of old-school deathmatch, you've got your B-hopping, your selection of impractical (and fun) guns all with their own unique alt-fire abilities, you've got weird maps with strange secrets to find, and best yet... A log-book where you can learn all about the characters, weapons and items you'll find in the strangest deathmatch game ever created...

Oh, and I forgot to mention the best part... It also features random item pickups ala mario kart... Just in case you needed the gameplay to get even more hectic...

name: Little Noah: Scion of Paradise
description: Join the genius alchemist Noah and her cat companion Zipper as they explore ancient ruins to uncover the secrets hidden within! Create unique teams and combos from 40+ recruitable allies in this casual but compelling game!

name: BTS Island: In the Seom
description:
Come over and take a break for a while.

At an island due to an unexpected vacation. BTS Island is a soothing puzzle game where the BTS members make stories and decorate their island. From the BTS Island title logo, character designs, and even the OST! Come play BTS Island: In the SEOM, a game that BTS has been a part of the development process since the beginning.

name: Sixty Words by Powgi
description: Sixty Words by Powgi is a unique type of word search puzzle: there's no grid, no wrong letters and no list of words to find. Each puzzle just contains 60 intertwined words, connected by a theme. As players discover the words, they paint them with a rainbow of vibrant highlights to create a unique, often stunning, result.

name: Cards & Dragon Sealed
description: A game that combines card battle and full-scale JRPG. Can boys and girls save the world from the crisis?

name: Blue Star Mobile Team
description: After the Blue Star mobile team has assembled, control the mecha to fight and defeat the dangerous creatures in the universe.

name: TheHunter: Call of the Wild - Revontuli Coast
description: Explore a sprawling archipelago that teems with life. Hunt waterfowl, ducks, and upland birds, in addition to larger game such as Brown Bear and Whitetail Deer. Gaze at the magical Northern Lights, and discover exciting new hunting opportunities in this region of the "land of a thousand lakes".

name: Wanderer
description: Wanderer is a top down action roguelike where you play as a cat.

name: Youmandriver
description: Do you know how to drive a fast car on open roads and a lot of traffic ? With realistic vehicle physics, traffic density and roads ? Realistic roads are designed for legal speed, not to let a gamer be 80% of the time full throttle driving a 500 HP car...

name: Super Animal Royale: Season 4
description: Select your favorite adorably murderous fox, panda, or sloth and parachute into a furocious 64-player battle arena. Explore a top-down 2D world, full of exotic biomes, psychotic animals, and hamster balls. Wield guns, explosives, and silly dances on your way to the top of the food chain.

name: The Chronicle
description: After receiving a package in the mail, Detective Walter Miles is suddenly transported to a World War II Era newspaper building. Can you solve the mystery and escape?

name: Farming Simulator 22: Kubota Pack
description: Extend the agricultural fleet of your farm with new vehicles and tools by Kubota, the multinational corporation that originated from Osaka, Japan!

name: Battlerace
description: Battlerace is a simple first-person shooter that invites you and your friends to play together! The game combines the most popular and best gameplay modes in one production! In Battlerace you decide how to play!

name: Squish
description: A spoopy, squishy, and fast-paced party game where you and up to three gooey friends rave it up in an underground crypt as it collapses down on you. You must push blocks, dodge, and jump to survive the rave and squish your opponents. Last Skelegoo standing takes it all!

name: F1 22: Champions Edition
description:
The Champions Edition includes:
- Limited-Time Bonus: Miami-Themed Content Pack
- 3 days Early Access
- F1 Life Starter Pack
- F1 22 New Era Content
- New My Team Icons
- 18,000 PitCoin

name: In the Space: Escape Room
description: You have infiltrated a spaceship where they perform various experiments. In this sci-fi escape room you will have to solve different puzzles and riddles to investigate what they are experimenting with. Will you be able to discover it and save humanity?

name: MX vs. ATV: Legends - Collector's Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Disgaea 6 Complete: Deluxe Edition
description:
The first new Disgaea game in six years is here!

Can a mere Netherworld zombie rise up and destroy a god? Find out in the newest installment of the Disgaea series! Features such as Super Reincarnation, 3D visuals, and adjustable gameplay settings make this the perfect game for both new and old Disgaea fans!

name: Portal: Companion Collection
description: Break the laws of spatial physics in the hilariously mind-bending adventures of Portal and Portal 2! Including Portal and Portal 2, the Companion Collection comes with all the groundbreaking gameplay, dark humor, and exploration that earned the series hundreds of awards.

name: MX vs. ATV: Legends
description: Race your way to victory on bikes, ATVs and UTVs in MX vs ATV Legends! Featuring massive new open environments, plus a career mode that lets you experience all the risks and rewards of becoming a world-famous professional rider. Become an off-road racing legend in your own right! Your time is now!

name: Crowz
description: Powerful nations are dispatching mercenaries to secure Q-On at contaminated sites, off limits to most men. Swarming around the sites like a flock of crows, they begin their own battles.

name: Mini Maker: Make A Thing
description: A hero thing, a monster thing, a robo thing… in Mini Maker, you can make any ‘thing’! Use an arsenal of plastic limbs, wonky tools, rainbow stickers and googly eyes to assemble creations, please demanding clients, and laugh in the face of perfectionism.

name: Acolyte
description: Acolyte is a dynamic narrative experience that gives you your own Acolyte; a digital assistant you can talk to freely with unlimited dialogue options. Just like a real conversation.

name: DNF Duel
description:
DNF Duel is a 2D fighting game using Dungeon Fighter Online's characters/classes as fighters. Dungeon Fighter Online currently has 16 base characters with over 60 total classes, though there is some overlap between the male and female variations.
It was revealed at the 2020 Dungeon&Fighter Universe Festival in Korea.
It is being developed by Neople, Arc System Works and Eighting.

A date was not announced but It is planned to be a multi-platform release

name: Rangers
description: This is a zombie survival game for one player and for cooperation in 4 players.

name: Fobia: St. Dinfna Hotel
description: Fobia: St. Dinfna Hotel is a first-person psychological horror indie game focused on environment exploration, survival and puzzles solving, developed by the Brazilian studio Pulsatrix Studios.

name: BrawlQuest
description: BrawlQuest is an action packed 2D brawling MMORPG designed around simplicity. Explore a large open world and uncover the secrets of the Northern Forest with friends or solo as you level up and prepare to face off against the world's mightiest monsters.

name: Turnpike
description: A (very loose) remake of the classic Duke 3D episode 3 secret level by Allen Blum, "Freeway", originally started during a Duke4.net "mappening"

name: Deltatraveler: Section 2
description: Oh, Mother (or, alternatively, Section 2) is the second Section of Deltatraveler, taking place in Earthbound's world.

name: Kuborabu
description:
Kuborabu is a puzzle game and both children and adults can play. The gameplay is based on rolling the character [a cube-crab] along paths of blocks that are revealed as Kuborabu moves, until it reaches his target. The challenge is to go through all the blocks. It is not possible to go back, as the block the character passed through gots locked. As the player finishes a path, another opens, with a greater degree of difficulty. Each path is generated randomly.

The combination of the words “cubo” and “crab” (cube in Portuguese) resulted in the name Kuborabu, and the spelling and sound refer to a word of Japanese origin.

name: Yaten's Horror Session
description:
Welcome to Yaten's Horror Session. You only have one misson. Find all objects.

You have to find the objects and be careful against the animatronics. They don't want you here. You should avoid them.
Every animatronic has a characteristic feature. You have to find their characteristic feature and use against them.

name: Wasure Yuki
description:
Hey, why didn't you come out? If I stay here like this, I'll be all alone in the snow. A fox cub and a mysterious story about snow.

An escape puzzle game where you navigate through the snow by following a fox cub.

name: Jamie Inside
description:
You've kidnapped a girl and sudden guests arrive at your house.
Distract and smooth talk them, so your visitors doesn't get bored or suspicious.
Don't let anyone find out what's inside your wardrobe!

name: Hypno Tetris
description: Kinky hypnosis fun with Tetris.

name: Super NemMeViu World 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Abel
description: An uncanny liminal space themed walking-simulator.

name: One
description: Boris Osterheld is dead. Venture into a world full of mystery and deceit. As you embark on an apparent search for answers, an erratic murderer and a colorful cast of characters only help to raise more questions. As you gather clues and get closer to the truth you will begin to question reality and even yourself.

name: Absence Makes...
description: A short interactive poem about life & longing whilst working from home.

name: We Are Not Alone
description: "We are Not Alone" is an alien-themed game inspired by the trashy horror movies of the 80s, with retro graphics and scary and even comical moments.

name: Retro Racing Bundle
description: Includes classic arcade-style racer Formula Retro Racing and retro-inspired space racing slipstreamer Space Ribbon!

name: Ashes: Exponential RPG
description:
Rogue like, steady progression. Gain 1000 levels and more in one fight !

An RPG in the heritage of "Inflation RPG" with his own atypical universe.
A lot of Items, a lot of weapons ! Optimise your stuff to reach the end in a limited numbers of fight !

name: Doctor Who: Lost in Time
description:
Power-up your Waypoints to obtain the mysterious Vortex Energy, a crucial force used to thwart the Doctor’s most fearsome foes.
Travel to classic locations from the franchise, and team up with your favorite companions! Together you’ll face enemies like the Daleks, Cybermen and many more! Collect character cards and use strange new resources like Kyfred Gems and Henoch Matter to level up your companions. These resources are key to discovering why the Doctor and friends find themselves lost in time.

name: SHPR
description: Sin descripción

name: Lewis Carroll's Alice
description: Lewis Carroll's Alice is a short interactive narrative game based on the classic English 1865 children's book, Alice's Adventures in Wonderland, by Lewis Carroll.

name: By the Pier
description: A simple fishing game for the Playdate

name: Avava
description: A quick reaction puzzle game – Find the missing rune to please the gods.

name: Ears of the Killer
description:
In XX City, a new music scene is forming - it's known as "Crime Wave" and all of the songs are about committing homicide. Meanwhile in the Beach District something is stirring, coming out of the sea. Can BB and her sister ZZ outrun the New Wave? Can anything change the shape of things to come?

"Of The Killer" series no. 7, cartoon mystery horror game for You.

name: Public Defense Corp: The Ambassador of Peace
description: Haruka finally catches a break after Jakou’s attack on Japan relents. At the same time, without any enemies to fight, her life as an FUW pilot has become a bit boring. Luckily, her staff has a great idea: become a tourism ambassador to help the economy recover!

name: Island Idle RPG
description: Lead the Balgairs - mercenaries creatures and experts in the art of hard working - manage the workforce, inputs, capital, other resources and help provide all the equipment and weaponry needed to defeat bosses in distant Dungeons

name: Everyone Moves With You
description: Take down powerful enemies in this hard 2d fantasy pixel game. If you like a challenge then you came to the right place. You'll travel through multiple different worlds, all sorts of different levels, enemies, weapons and so much more. With new levels being made often.

name: World of Cubes
description: This is a small childhood game.

name: Twin Edge
description: Twin Edge is a refreshing circular take on the Rhythm Game genre. Divide your attention evenly between two rotating circles and and try not to lose your rhythm!

name: Xolotl
description: Jump, dash, and swim in this epic adventure! Explore the vast Aztec lands of Xochimilco in an axolotl action-platformer! Xolotl is a tough, 2D action-platformer, in which your goal is to regain your godly form and powers.

name: HangOutGame
description: HangOutGame is a game about climbing. Sometimes it may be difficult because of different obstacles. You can use a rope with hook, a blaster and your agility. Your task is getting to the finish in each world. You can do it by yourself or unite with a friend.

name: Forrest Byrnes: Up in Smoke
description: Join FORREST BYRNES to fight a malignant blaze threatening our sumptuous woodlands! CAN you save the wayward campers? Will you SEE the danger that stalks the forest? Only YOU can help Forrest stop this shameful waste!

name: Battleship Godios
description: Battleship Godios is a game with a high level of difficulty and trial & error gameplay that makes retrying inevitable. Use the limited number of bullets to break down battleships!

name: Nurse Panic!
description: You play as a Magical Nurse in her first spectacular day working at Rorsh Hospital! Inspired by retro platformers and made for the Magical Girl Game Jam #5.

name: Flash McCoy
description: Sin descripción

name: Vs. Tricky
description: Sin descripción

name: Tortured Souls
description: Sin descripción

name: Sanevol Incident 44
description: Sanevol Incident 44 is a realistic urban exploration VHS Found Footage horror title.

name: Escape PS2 Hagrid
description:
Hagrid makes his return in this mind-breaking sequel to the all-time bestselling piece of software junk "Escape PS1 Hagrid". With over 200 game of the year awards, before the release this game happens to be a more than worthy successor to its predecessor.

Rated with "69/10" by the renowned newspaper "The onion"

name: Structory
description: Structory is a seasonally updated, atmospheric structure mod/datapack with light lore for Minecraft.

name: They are Confined
description: An entry for the Dream Diary Jam 6. You explore the protagonist's troubled past through their dreams. This game has no "Effects" to collect. Your goal is to find / view particular "Events" that will lead you to the end.

name: The Foxglove Catcher
description:
A young man falls down a cavern, into a different world.

The Foxglove Catcher is a Yume Nikki Fangame made for Dream Diary Jam.

name: Severed Ties
description: Severed Ties is a Yume Nikki fangame created for Dream Diary Jam 6. The goal is to explore the dreamworld and find all 9 effects to unlock the ending.

name: Internal Plexus
description:
A Cayote named Fletcher wakes up one night when his computer updates on it's own. He finds a mysterious fuse box that wasn't there before attached, and a mass of wires leading to a strange mechanical door in his basement...

It was developed as an entry for Dream Diary Jam 6.

name: Fracture: The Dream
description:
A sudden and seamless realization of consciousness...

Play as Monoe and explore a Labyrinth of interconnected worlds, wherein you discover secrets and come to shocking conclusions.

A 3D Yume Nikki fangame developed for Dream Diary Jam 6.

name: Dream Records
description: Dream Records is a game where you explore Hizashi's dreams and you can collect hairstyles. A YNFG for DDJ6.

name: Deteriation Game
description:
Deteriation Game which is a misspelling of deterioration, is a game about exploring your dreams and figuring out who you are. Travel through surreal recreations of your memory, or is it all just real?

Made for Dream Diary Jam 6.

name: Friday Night Funkin': Halloween Hack
description: Feel the wrath of Dr. Andonuts' Rage and fight in a rap battle to the death!

name: Sonic 3 Timelines SMS Remake
description: A fanmade remake of both Sonic the Hedgehog Chaos and Sonic the Hedgehog Triple Trouble for Sega Game Gear, featuring new characters and habilities, new zones and levels, red star rings to unlock new stages, blue spheres special stages, Time Stones, a 16 bit music mode, a hub world, Ultra transformations, a pause menu, a debug mode and cheats, new color palettes and new player camera, gamepad support, 30 and 60 fps support, 4:3, widescreen and ultrawide.

name: Shoalroot
description: Play as a merperson and farm underwater featuring water animals and plants!

name: Hungry Lamu
description: Hungry Lamu is a game about a Lamu in search fruits to fill his stomach, but things started to get scary after the sun goes down.

name: The Vaults of Minos
description: The Vaults of Minos is a fluid arcade Jump 'n Run with a gripping story and randomized levels. Every attempt to defeat your enemies will contain new traps, bosses, and challenges. Can you defeat your opponent and leave the cursed Vaults of Minos alive?

name: Somnium Angelus
description:
Somnium Angelus is a Yume Nikki fangame created for Dream Diary Jam 2022 by SisterSoft.

Enter the dreams of 3 girls to find them and bring them to their home on the moon...

name: Cold
description: An English Yume Nikki fangame developed as an entry for Dream Diary Jam 6. You play as Aruben who wakes up in a strange place, surviving and exploring his Cold dreams.

name: Odd One Out
description: Find the symbol that is different from the others, in progressively harder puzzles.

name: The Alchemist
description: Play the role of an apprentice alchemist on the road in a merchant caravan. During the journey you will discover many things, including love? A gay medieval fantasy visual novel.

name: Skateboarding 2: Breakthrough Gaming Arcade
description: Sin descripción

name: The Dog K
description: The clicking adventure you and your friends need. Eat cookies with the main hero of the game The Dog K. Eat all the cookies in the world!

name: The Jumping Soda: Turbo
description: Sin descripción

name: Funky Cards Arena
description: A deck builder game which consists of utilizing your cards to destroy the opposing orb. It is a large crossover of many franchises, you can make Garfield battle Neymar from Fortnite, Goku battle Dora and there are even original characters. You will be able to unlock them all in the Funky Packs.

name: Dare to Dream
description: Two small maps, a classic-style base themed intro and a castle themed conclusion. Uses custom music by Angryfrogs, custom skyboxes by Makkon / Sock, and some id1 and mg1 textures.

name: One Day After School
description: Short doujin visual novel created as a test for further projects.

name: Yakuza Restored
description:
A restoration patch for the original US version of Yakuza for PS2.

Changes include Japanese audio (undub), a revised script, and redone graphical elements.

name: Toy Story Tamagotchi
description: he Toy Story Tamagotchi is a licensed Tamagotchi Nano model based on Disney and Pixar's animated film series Toy Story.

name: World in a Moment
description:
*click* makes the stopwatch as you press its button. The last sound you hear before the world becomes silent and motionless. Wind no longer blows, rain no longer falls. The world has become free of humans, animals and everything else that attests to the flow of time. Without a material body you traverse trough this new realm frozen in time. Days, weeks or perhaps even years go by as you lose yourself on this new adventure before even a moment in you old world passes.

Welcome to World in a Moment, a photo collage exploration game.

name: Skwampt
description: Skwampt is a Yume Nikki-like game about exploring the memories of an alien flying through space. Made for Dream Diary Jam 6.

name: Equinox
description: Equinox is an English Yume Nikki fangame created by scummbag in RPG Maker MV. It was developed as an entry for Dream Diary Jam 6.

name: Any.One Online
description:
Any.One Online is an English Yume Nikki fangame developed as an entry for Dream Diary Jam 6. The goal of the game is to explore and collect Costumes. There are also tokens that can be found throughout the virtual world.

When you were still in high school, the only social MMO you ever consistently played was Any.One Online. With new virtual reality tech and user-created worlds, you and your friends used to spend hours exploring, dressing up your avatars, and meeting new people in the strange digital environment. But that was years ago: even though the servers are still running, Any.One Online is practically a virtual ghost town. For nostalgia's sake, however, you decide to log back in. What you find is a surreal landscape only barely related to what you remember, a decade’s worth of unsupported code, scattered costumes, and the looming feeling that something's not right…

name: Red Lucy
description: Red Lucy is an adult visual novel with a focus on more mature women and the secrets that they hold. There is a large emphasis on music and art's relationship with the human experience.

name: Snug Finder
description: Snug Finder - is a beautiful hidden object game. Become a finder and try to find all the objects, but be careful, sometimes it’s not that easy. Immerse yourself in a wonderful game with lovely illustrations, gorgeous sounds and cozy atmosphere.

name: Fish'n Feathers
description: Fish are falling from the sky in this arcade fishing mashup for Playdate

name: Super Vadimka IV Evil Returns the Horrors of Vadimka's Adventures
description: Super Vadimka IV Evil Returns the Horrors of Vadimka's Adventures is an action-adventure video game in the platformer genre.

name: Bakso Simulator
description:
Have you ever dreamed of having your own bakso restaurant?
Dream no further, because now you can do it all with Bakso Simulator!
In this world, you will own your own bakso restaurant with your old friend
Help the townsfolks by doing their quests and uncover all the secrets in town!

name: 3D Joys
description: 3D Joys is a collection of VR games that will use a 3D Joystick.

name: Smuta: Inception
description: Smuta: Inception is a classic defense of your base.

name: The Rabbit's Scroll
description: Play as a rabbit ascending up a paper scroll, scrambling to escape a rampaging wall of deadly ink. Can you ensure your beautiful world won't be erased from the history books?

name: Steiiaria
description: Steiiaria - Endless space lo-fi adventure for all lovers of puzzles and fun! Mahjong, space and planets come together to give you the ultimate gameplay and music enjoyment in this game.

name: Car Destroyer
description: Car Destroyer is a pixel racing arena that will make you fight in ruthless wastelands.

name: Me Alone Reissue
description: Apocalypse on earth! Many people have turned into monsters that eat the survivors. Stay alive as long as possible! God bless you.

name: Chickweed
description: A strange creature has escaped from the lab... and that creature is you! Fight your way to freedom through hordes of enemies, dangerous traps and treacherous ambushes in this hardcore platformer and uncover the mystery of the running bush!

name: Doudas Danger
description: This unusual platformer will throw you into the thick of a hot skirmish in the depths of a magical forest! The undead, slugs and mimics rebelled and stole all the treasures of the forest - your task is to return them.

name: Bug Butcher
description: Bug butcher is a roguelite action game with random locations, dynamic gameplay and tons of bugs.

name: Serafina and the Key to the Egg
description: A classic style, turn-based RPG. -- Serafina is a woman who lives in a remote, hidden village. When an opportunity presents itself to recover a stolen family heirloom known as the Oval Key, she has little choice but to leave the village in an attempt to recover it.

name: SurrounDead
description: SurrounDead is an open world survival game. Taking place in a world ravaged by an apocalyptic catastrophe. The dead reign free and will stop at nothing to kill you.

name: Dimensions of Mind
description: Enter to the characters mind and make decisions. The game is played like interactive movie/adventure game with morality choices which influence the outcome which can be: a manipulative, balanced or violent. The game is based on psychology/philosophy and teaches about thoughts and their consequences.

name: DCS World: F/A-18C Raven One: Dominant Fury Campaign by Baltic Dragon
description: Raven One: Dominant Fury campaign for the F/A-18C Hornet is a prequel for the highly acclaimed Raven One campaign, based on the bestselling novel of the same title. Developed by Baltic Dragon, all the missions were constructed with the active participation of author of the book, Kevin Miller, and Vincent "Jell-O" Aiello, host of the Fighter Pilot Podcast - both retired U.S. Navy Hornet pilots, each with over 3,000 career flight hours and numerous overseas deployments.

name: DCS World: Spitfire Beware! Beware! Campaign by Reflected Simulations
description: During the winter of 1942-43, the air battle raging in the skies over Europe was at its fiercest. The Focke Wulfs and Messerschmitts flown by the Luftwaffe’s ’experten’ proved to be more than a worthy foe for the RAF’s new Spitfire Mk.IX-s. The air supremacy of the Allies was still just a distant dream. In the thickest of this battle stood the Biggin Hill Wing with 611 (West Lancashire) and 340 (Ile de France) Squadrons.

name: DCS World: MAD JF-17 Thunder Campaign by Stone Sky
description: This campaign guides the player through a gripping storyline about a PMC pilot named Vitalii Gerasimov. You will take part in a series of campaigns called MAD Mutually assured Destruction.

name: The Nanny Affair 3
description: The Nanny Affair, Book 3 is the third and final book of The Nanny Affair series. It succeeds its first two books, The Nanny Affair, Book 1 and The Nanny Affair, Book 2.

name: H1-Mod
description:
H1-Mod is a modded client for Call of Duty: Modern Warfare Remastered. This client aims to provide a better-than-vanilla experience, with many quality-of-life features which are designed with gameplay enhancements in mind. The original game on Steam did not have a huge player base and is considered a forgotten Call of Duty. Also, the original game has so many game-breaking features that it is hard to play the original experience without facing a issue every so often.

With H1-Mod, new features include, but are not limited to: unlocked field of view adjustment, HUD safe area adjustment, detailed sensitivity adjustment, multiple fullbright modes, disabling of broken shader caching, unlocking all cosmetics, stat changing, uncapped max FPS, and a dedicated server browser.

name: Xiaoyao Kezhan
description: Sin descripción

name: Tokyo Revengers Pazuribe!
description: Tokyo Revengers: Pazuribe! is the official Tokyo Revengers game designed for smartphones on iOS and Android. It is a puzzle game with multiple sub-stories loosely based on the anime adaptation.

name: Bride of the Nightmare
description: A fantasy that begins when the moon hides in a dream.

name: An Inner Walk
description: An Inner Walk is a traditional Yume Nikki fangame. You play as an unnamed character who explores the outside of their room, going through various familiar places representing memories from its past and present.

name: Idle Anomaly: Alien Control
description:
Build a research station around the mysterious Obelisk space and control all its secrets in this idle clicker explore game!

A group of space researchers recently came across a strange structure in the Arctic. It looks like an alien roller coaster or alien starship from the UFO theme park. This Obelisk was clearly made by an unknown power.
In the process of building explorer home base, something strange gait of a zombie appears in the territory. But it isn't a zombie, it is an alien!
They will try to attack and to interfere with the Obelisk research and building of your clicker Empire!

name: Doodle God: Evolution - Doodle Mafia Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Bittersweet Dream
description: A Yume Nikki-inspired fangame. You play as Lizzie and explore their dream world.

name: Personal Space
description: An anti-social roguelike for the ages. Humans may be social creatures, but you sure as heck aren't! Use a variety of items and abilities to ensure your "survival" against hoards extroverted people. Be persistent, and keep your distance. No violence required.

name: In Hazy Clouds
description:
In Hazy Clouds is an English Yume Nikki fangame developed for Dream Diary Jam 6.

This is a game of exploring the imagined world of Fairu(tsuki), an apprehensive room-dweller who is constantly grasping at a world from their past ..... what will you find?

name: Okami no Yume
description:
Okami no Yume is an English Yume Nikki fangame developed as an entry for Dream Diary Jam 6.
Explore different facets of Gizatsuki's identity through their dreams, collect forms and change shape. Beware the curse.

name: Friday Night Funkin': VS Kacy
description: After BF and GF help Kacy and her foe, they continue their path of finding the right opponent for BF... or just getting out of the space-like environment. Too bad that they get sucked into a black hole, because they got company!

name: Little Mouse's Encyclopedia + Cyber Protocol
description: Explore the natural world while learning through play, then compete with your friends in a cyberpunk logic game! A great game for little ones, Little Mouse's Encyclopedia comes bundled with Cyber Protocol!

name: Pancake Bar Tycoon: Extended Edition
description: Do you like pancakes? Enjoy their taste? Do you want to make them yourself? Well... why not give it a try? Let's make one right away! Scoop up some pancake batter and drizzle it on a frying pan. Watch as it turns golden brown.

name: Capcom Fighting Bundle
description: Capcom Fighting Bundle includes two other bundles: Capcom Fighting Collection, which features 10 titles from series such as Street Fighter and Darkstalkers, Cyberbots, and the first home console port of Red Earth; and Street Fighter 30th Anniversary Collection, originally released in 2018.

name: Fairy Tale Ending Encore
description:
Visual novel game focused on metafiction.
It is an indie game developed by Takano Senko.

You can download this in "Freem!".
Only Windows and Japanese version.

name: Space Explorers: Red Planet
description: You're the lonesome astronaut with your jetpack-set. You will experience planet exploration with 7 different jetpacks on an abandoned planet.

name: The Bronze Age
description:
This year you have been assigned to be the CEO of the Bronze mine.
To start mining the bronze and become the biggest bronze mine in the world.
Good Luck and Have Fun.

name: Mikeyeldey95
description: Relive the experience of 90s computing and the early Internet in this all-new game for the Sega Genesis / Mega Drive.

name: Holocure: Save the Fans!
description: Collect powerful weapons and items and experiment with all kinds of builds to create the ultimate character! Will you be able to defeat the endless waves of enemies, and reach the top rankings?

name: Amaemi: Longing for you
description:
The protagonist, Nabeshima Tatsuya, was a world-renowned painter.

However, after a certain incident, he disappeared from the public eye.
Now as a social studies teacher, he spends his days away from the art world.

He lives in seclusion with his cat in his social studies preparation room, which is his own residence, away from the public eye.
However, with the arrival of the new school semester, a new wind begins to blow.

Kusunoki Iroha, an attractive girl who adores Tatsuya.

Kurusu Sakuya, the most talented girl in the school, who mysteriously invites Tatsuya to the school;

and Akebi Saki, the daughter of Tatsuya's former teacher.

A life of dullness, like being dead inside while living.
Now it is being colored in gorgeous and vibrant colors by the three girls.

name: Coffee Break
description: Coffee Break is an arcade game that lets the user knock out Coffee themed items with a unique Coffee mug paddle and ball. Unique Animated levels, Mini-Bosses and Powerups to collect as you progress through the levels. Thirty Levels to compete in and battle mini bosses on your way to victory. Single player fun and arcade style entertainment.

name: Project: Name
description: Project: Name is a hardcore Perma-Death first person platformer. Try to beat all three levels!

name: Rocket Drift
description: Rocket Drift is a fun, casual, solo rocket racing game for all ages. Rotate your rocket left + right and thrust forward to navigate each level. Be sure to avoid walls and obstacles! Race across the finish line and set your best time!

name: Brutal Japan
description: "Brutal Japan" is a survival horror set in modern Japan. Experience a brutal horror that is indistinguishable from reality.

name: The Horace Trilogy
description: In the early 1980s, the Horace games were some of the most beloved on the ZX Spectrum. Now, take on the maze navigating of Hungry Horace, the slope slaloming of Horace Goes Skiing, and the challenging platforming of Horace and the Spiders in this compilation.

name: Fanatic Zeal
description: Rogue-lite Quarter View Hack&Slash. Bosses have randomly chosen traits, and you will get different treasure in each play. Online score ranking board (for each difficulties)

name: Eronoctosis: Devote Yourself to Another
description: 3 New Maps, 6 New Enemies. A fear of intimacy has fractured your mind again, dive deeper. Confront your insecurities, expose your vulnerability.

name: The Jumping Soda
description: Sin descripción

name: Wreck the Fed
description: Fight inflation the American way: by shooting it in the face. Play as your favorite libertarians and destroy the Federal Reserve's control over our money!

name: Simba the Cat
description: This game is a single Player platform in third person and the character view can rotate 360 degrees,Simba run, can jump and pickup the special objects hidden in the maps game, Simba run to find all the Golden Chickens,Cat Keys. The cat can drive vehicles and change characters in bonus levels

name: Vacuum Story
description: A vacuum cleaner, tied to his daily cleaning routine, passively experiences the events that affect the family that owns it.

name: Occult Rewrite
description: Face the fearsome "Withering Curse"! Dive deep into the ample bosom of thruth! Rewrite your own history on this Ero-Horror adventure! When you and your classmates find yourselves trapped on a mist shrouded island only you can save them from a grim -and often lewd- fate.

name: Air Twister
description: Soar through the sky battling against invaders in this all-new fantasy endless shooter from legendary game creator, Yu Suzuki. Players will assume the role of Princess Arch fighting back against bizarre invaders to save their planet from destruction. They’ll rain down their homing arrows to trace graceful arcs of light across beautiful, artfully crafted stages, before they pierce their foes. With a fun and easy touchscreen swipe-shooting gameplay mechanic, the destiny of the planet is in the player’s hands.

name: The Coven of Calahree
description: Three wacky, wild, and witchy sisters are up to no good in this fantasy RPG world. They’re off battling dungeon beasts, performing odd jobs and quests for the local townspeople all in hopes to gain as many new followers as they can for their new Coven…The Coven of Calahree.

name: Fighting Legends Pack
description:
This edition includes the following:
- Capcom Fighting Collection
- Street Fighter: 30th Anniversary Collection International

name: Faircroft's Antiques: The Mountaineer's Legacy
description: It's summer in the French highlands for Mia Faircroft! Discover a picturesque mountainside town in this Hidden Object game. Explore breathtaking locations, restore priceless treasures, and help out the various residents of Mont Cache!

name: Other
description: Challenge your friends in Other ! Collect 5 letters to eliminate your opponents, be the last player alive to win !

name: Fire Emblem Warriors: Three Hopes
description: Prepare for a different story set in the same universe as Fire Emblem: Three Houses. Shez, a mercenary whose team was decimated by Byleth in battle, joins the military academy of Garreg Mach Monastery and becomes a student in one of three classes, each including students from one of the three nations of the continent of Fódlan.
