Like in Three Houses, the game allows players to decide which class to join, leading to different story paths and playable characters.

name: Everything Is For Humanity
description: Everything is for Humanity is a story-driven, exploration and puzzle-solving based science fiction horror game which sets in a massive science facility in 2020. You will discover tons of things and find out about the blood-chilling truths with its first-person experience.

name: How I learned to Skate
description: How I learned to Skate is a top-down challenge game about ice-skating. Some might call it a rage game. The player controls each leg and the body tilt of the character individually, trying to chase after a girl on an increasingly difficult path.

name: Book of Adventum
description: An action-adventure FPS which combines the time-honored problem solving of adventure FPS games - shooting people in the face and getting through not-so-difficult puzzles - with metaphysical ponderings. You can craft and mod stuff as well.

name: Mrs. Fantastic's Freaky Figurine Shop
description: Three lost souls find themselves stuck as figurines in a toy maker’s shop. They must use their new found bodies, a bear, a tiger, and a monkey, to escape the circus themed toy shop and return to their previous selves. Can they work together to find a way out?

name: The Sound of Fireworks: The Haiku
description: Follow the story of Amimi Imai, an 18 year old student who's recent move from home has left her succumbed to a new high school and new life. The Sound of Fireworks: The Haiku is a single path/ending visual novel about love, acceptance, and a good ol' awkward budding teenage friendship.

name: AI: The Somnium Files - Nirvana Initiative: Collector's Edition
description:
The Collector's Edition includes:

- The game
- Exclusive figure of the beautiful AI-Ball “Aiba”
- Artbook featuring concept art and illustrations by Yusuke Kozaki
- Official soundtrack by returning composer Keisuke Ito

name: Skydom
description: Skydom is an open-world experience all about combat and adventure. Swords clash, arrows fly, and dragons roar.

name: Riley Short: Sibling Circuitry
description: Straybots! Robots! Best Friends! Siblings! And one kid to short circuit them all in Riley Short: Sibling Circuitry!

name: Personal Space
description: Escape the clutches of friendship and social expectations in this top-down puzzler about living with social anxiety.

name: Oopi's Quest
description: Oopi has crash landed on an unknown planet. It's up to you to guide Oopie through the different areas collecting nuts to fix his ship.

name: Corleone Online
description: Corleone Online is a MMORPG 2D game full of guns!

name: Captain A-Hole's Guide To Getting Old(er)
description: Experience what it's like getting old(er) with Captain A-Hole. Purchase the comic to learn how to age the "Captain" way, as well as enter VR to undergo this new hand tracking storytelling experience.

name: "So, About Last Night..."
description: "So, About Last Night..." is an interactive web-based novella. Taking place in 1996 Southern California, Lacey tries finding the girl she hooked up with before she woke up with the worst hangover of her life and an impulse to drink blood.

name: Sonic Origins: Premium Fun Pack
description: The Sonic Origins Premium Fun Pack features Hard Missions, Letterbox Background, Bonus Character Animations in-menu & music player, and additional re-mastered music tracks.

name: Teachers. With Love and Passion
description: It's time to start a new life, make friends, live a sweet school romance, and face dark secrets.

name: The Idle Forces: Army Tycoon
description:
The Idle Forces: Army Tycoon is incremental game. But it isn’t one of the traditional idle city builder games! You won't find here supermarket, restaurant, roller coaster and amusement park because it is an army simulator, rookie!
Do you want to become an idle army commander and command the tycoon military units of a powerful state and execute peacekeeping campaigns? Do you want to raise a recruit to a military specialist? Bring Freedom, Law and Order even to the most remote corners of the planet!

name: Generation Zero: Base Warfare Starter Bundle
description: The Generation Zero: Base Warfare Starter Bundle includes the main game and five DLCs that gives you everything you need to fortify your base as well as expanding your arsenal with a wide range of new weapons.

name: Generation Zero: Tactical Equipment Pack
description: The Resistance fighters have gotten craftier with their combat techniques, trying out both established and improvised equipment for battle purposes. This particular batch brings both explosive and defensive elements to the battle and can be crafted using materials collected across Östertörn. Additionally, a small amount has been put into your Plundra storage box for experimentation purposes. So head out there and wreak some havoc!

name: Jumping Flash!
description: Experience Jumping Flash! originally released on the PlayStation console, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

name: Super Stardust Portable
description:
Experience Super Stardust Portable originally released on the PSP system, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

Defend five vulnerable planets from incoming danger as you explode into some manic shoot ’em up action. Take out entire space fleets across two exciting game modes: Arcade and Planet.

name: TerraTech: Falcon Genesis
description: Inspired by the fastest moving creatures on Earth, the Falcon Genesis skin pack for Hawkeye and Venture introduces slick, aerodynamic block designs and raptor motifs, giving your Techs a smart new look as you explore the world via ground and air.

name: The Caligula Effect 2: Complete Edition
description:
Complete Edition includes:
- Caligula 2 base game
- Set of 3 Battle Tracks A
- Set of 3 Battle Tracks B
- Complete Stigma Pack

name: Eternal Return: Beachside Splash Character Bundle
description: The new Eternal Return DLC is here with the summer heat! Meet the Beachside Splash Character Bundle DLC at a special price.

name: Real Car Driving
description: If you are looking for a realistic driving simulator where you can drive a variety of cars on big open world maps, this game is just for you!

name: Bus Simulator 21: VDL Bus Pack
description:
Get ready to enjoy the latest Bus Simulator 21 expansion pack and expand your bus fleet with three new fancy buses!

This Bus Simulator 21 – Bus Pack includes three new buses licensed from renowned manufacturer VDL Bus & Coach!

Citea SLF-120 Electric
40-feet e-bus with a capacity of up to 92 passengers. Comprises 2 axles and 3 doors.

Citea SLFA-181 Electric, BRT design
E-articulated 60-feet bus with a maximum capacity of 143 passengers. It features 3 axles and 4 doors.

Citea SLFA-180 Electric
60-feet articulated bus that can accommodate up to 145 passengers. It is equipped with 3 axles and 4 doors.

name: Naraka: Bladepoint - Ultimate Edition
description: Naraka: Bladepoint is a 60-player PVP mythical action combat experience with martial arts inspired melee combat, gravity defying mobility, vast arsenals of melee & ranged weapons, legendary customizable heroes with epic abilities.

name: Automaton Lung
description:
Make use of your special abilities to skate, shoot, and fly through over 40 unique locations, all rendered in beautiful stereoscopic 3D. In a strange land with almost no information you must be resourceful and clever.
Question everything you see and trust nothing you hear.
Each footstep taken, every mile flown, and all doorways entered reveal more to discover in Automaton Lung.

name: Mysperyence Story 1: The Curious Case of the Headless Magnate
description: Mysperyence is a portmanteau that combines the words mystery and experience.

name: Super Hero Flying School
description: Is it a bird? Or is it a plane? Or maybe… A brick falling straight down? Actually it’s up to you my friend! Super heroes usually fly right? But at some point they need to learn how to do it. And your goal is to teach them how, in the Super Hero Flying School.

name: Justice Fighting Force
description:
In a world filled with superheroes and villains, you’re just an average high schooler. You’ve never seen a hero or villain in person, but that all changes when you cross paths with an oddly dressed girl…

Suddenly, you find yourself ripped away from your normal life and at the mercy of three beautiful villains bent on taking over the city. Can you come to understand why they do the things they do, or will you remain an ignorant puppet in their schemes?

name: Bassmaster Fishing 2022: Super Deluxe Edition
description: Experience the thrill of competitive big bass fishing and climb the ranks to become the Bassmaster Classic champion!

name: Sonic the Hedgehog 3 & Knuckles
description:
Sonic the Hedgehog 3 & Knuckles was remastered and released as part of the Sonic Origins compilation, alongside the remasters of Sonic 1, 2 and CD. It has improvements over the original version, such as widescreen support and higher resolution, due to running in a different engine from the original game. Such as the other ports in the compilation, this remaster also adds the Drop Dash ability which starred in Sonic Mania.
Part of the soundtrack had to be changed to the songs of the PC port of Sonic the Hedgehog 3, which are based on the beta soundtrack of the game.

name: Toree Genesis
description: A small(!) three level toree thing to celebrate the 31st birthday of that hedgehog.

name: Syphon Filter
description: A port of Syphon Filter, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

name: Cyber Engine
description: “Cyber Engine” is an incremental game where you need to build a supercomputer in a futuristic style of technology. Pressing a “Square” button on the gamepad rewards the player with currency. The player may spend the currency to purchase items or abilities that allow the player to earn the currency faster or automatically. The goals are to build a full cyber engine and earn a billion dollars.

name: Tiny Tina's Wonderlands: Molten Mirrors
description:
Break into a heavily fortified prison in Vesper's third Mirror of Mystery! Fight past the turrets, hammers, and furnaces protecting Fyodor the Soul Warden to shatter the chains binding his captive souls.
Deep within his mountain stronghold, Fyodor the Soul Warden lords over his horde of lost souls.
In order to break their chains, you'll need to work past his murderous mechanized defenses, including terror-powered turrets, blazing furnaces, and bone-crushing hammers. But keep your wits about you, lest you become yet another of his captive souls!

name: Viltnemda
description: You've been called into the forest to investigate a wounded deer, but the forest is dark and all you have is a flashlight. Oh bother, what a Tuesday you're having.A retro PSX style horror game

name: Project Lazarus
description: You are the first party mech pilot of alien planet colonizers! Project Lazarus is a survival game with rogue-lite elements. Deploy and upgrade your mech to the metal!

name: Hunt for Junk
description: Hunt for Junk is a retro Platformer that follows the graphical limitations of the classic Gameboy (e.g. 4 colors and a 160x144px resolution). Journey the world in your unending pursuit of delicious Junkfood! Avoid traps, fight enemies, collect coins and discover all of the hidden Junkfood items!

name: Bullet Bash
description: Minigames meet FPS madness in this epic party game. Play with your friends, your enemies and your friends recently turned enemies.

name: I Commissioned Some Bees 2
description: The brief was simple. Artists were commissioned to create a fantasy world, and hide as many bees as they can inside it. Now it’s your job to find them all! With 10 art pieces to choose from, and 1000+ bees, you will have a lot of searching to do.

name: Detective Max: Double Clues
description: Get ready to solve dozens of puzzles, use your sharp mind, explore mysterious locations and find evidence to find the killer. Can you become a true detective?

name: Pachi Pachi 2: On a Roll
description: Our beloved thieves Fujiko and Robin have managed to escape from the Money City police. However, citizens are not happy with this situation, that's why they have decided to create a new search team to catch them once and for all and restore stability …

name: Big Earth
description: In a post-apocalyptic future where Earth's resources have been consumed, Kyle Seed tries to recover capsules containing special seeds and the energy needed to save humanity's future. Big Earth is a platform game with challenging puzzles.

name: Edgar A. Poe: The Oval Portrait
description: What seems like a game may be something more. Is it a story waiting to be told or... felt? Enter the universe of Edgar A. Poe, where reason, like the devil, says "Goodnight".

name: Zombies Invasion
description: Zombie Invasion is an arena shooter with a top view. Move through the levels, the further into the forest, the more dead people. Hold out and kill everyone!

name: Sakura Spirit
description: Rising Judo Star Gushiken Takahiro was two weeks away from the match that would make or break his career – a championship match where the winner is then signed up to be a young national athlete for Japan. He was very determined to win, to fulfill his dre…

name: Zuria
description: Build your own tank and battle with other players! Using building tool create unique shape, add weapons, movement and compete with other players in construction skills.

name: Cube Decider
description: Cube Decider is a logic puzzle game with RPG elements where you need to make your way through each level collecting power-up and deciding whom and when to attack using your logic and arithmetic skills.

name: A Match with a Succubus Witch
description: A Match with a Succubus Witch tells the story of a guy who lives into a fantasy world where he meets a sucubbus witch ready to fulfill their most pleasurable desires. Gameplay is a Match 3 classic with visual novel that allows the player to take off their clothes and make choices to keep in track...

name: Transport INC: Seamanship
description: Expand your Transport INC gameplay into the oceans of the world. New vehicles, events, custom routes, water themed maps, and more await beyond the water horizon.

name: Curious Expedition 2: Shores of Taishi
description: The Shores of Taishi DLC features a brand new island type (the Celestial Shores) with new tile types, items, locations, enemies, recruitable characters and more.

name: Jishogi
description: A dark, story-heavy puzzle game. Enter the mind of Mayu, as her soul is invaded and dug through by a seemingly evil witch. Can you stop her? What if you were able to get the upper hand, and invade her back? Would you show mercy, or destroy her? Jishogi will test you in more ways than one.

name: My Naughty Summer Vacation: Days in Countryside and Memories of Summer
description: An 3D simulation RPG in which the main character returns to the countryside and enjoys his summer vacation. Let's spend a special summer in the countryside with heroines, by talking, go to various places with countryside, playing, and others, while making memories of the summer.

name: Fort Boyard 2022
description: Cross the threshold of Fort Boyard and complete the challenges! Take up the challenge with more than 10 activities that combine Action and Party Games! Endurance, dexterity, and perseverance will be your best assets for collecting boyard coins.

name: Sonic Origins: Digital Deluxe Edition
description: Relive the classic collected adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog, Sonic the Hedgehog 2, Sonic 3 & Knuckles, and Sonic CD in this remastered Deluxe Edition, featuring bonus digital content.

name: Cyclone
description: Cyclone is a puzzling first-person action-platformer from the creator of the hit Portal modification, Blue Portals. Solve a series of perplexing puzzles by placing gravity-bending vortexes in the world. Launch objects, redirect projectiles, and fling yourself across the room to reach the exit!

name: Quester
description: Quester is an action roguelike inspired by classic arcade games of yore. Assume control of a courageous adventurer and blaze through monster infested mazes, all while keeping your stamina-- AKA "POWER" bar charged.

name: "Life" not found;
description: After listening to a new rap album I got inspired to vent by turning my feelings into a little game, where you play as a virus on his computer, making his life better, the hard way.

name: Eragon's Tale
description: Brave through the darkness in his dreams. Or die trying.

name: Rojiura Glory Hole
description: Sin descripción

name: 9: Nine
description: 9-nine- is an all-ages supernatural mystery visual novel!

name: Meikei no Lupercalia: Limited Edition
description:
The Limited Edition of Meikei no Lupercalia includes:
- The Game
- An A6-size acrylic panel
- A3-size poster
- Theme Song CD

name: Aiyoku no Eustia: Limited Edition
description:
This edition includes the following:
- Aiyoku no Eustia: Angel's Blessing
- Special Acrylic Ornament

name: Aiyoku no Eustia
description: After the world's surface broke down, the city of Novus Aether floats in the sky, thanks to the prayers of the Holy Maiden. Unfortunately, due to the interruption of the prayer, the "Gran Forte" occurred, causing a part of the ground to collapse and splitting the lower city in two.

name: Meikei no Lupercalia
description: A romance visual novel and a SFW port, developed by Uguisu Kagura.

name: Capcom Fighting Collection
description: Capcom Fighting Collection is a compilation of arcade versions of ten fighting games originally developed and published by Capcom. It adds new features to the original games such as online play with rollback netcode, training and spectator modes, save states, concept art, design documents, and a music player.

name: Social Services of the Doomed
description: With all the supernatural feuds you mediate, from vampires to trolls, your city job should be paying you more. And Hell's got a great offer for your soul.

name: Naraka: Bladepoint - Deluxe Edition
description: Experience the Unchained Multiplayer Combat with NARAKA: BLADEPOINT DELUXE EDITION, including pre-order bonus, an exclusive hero outfit, a weapon skin and a grappling hook, and 10 tidal crates, together with digital soundtrack and digital art booklet

name: Ruggnar
description: Ruggnar is a platformer without enemies, but many traps are hidden in the darkness. Help Ruggnar explore gloomy places with his bag and a few candles as his sole equipment.

name: Night of the loving dead
description: Easy game for easy life. Enjoy.

name: Veil of Dust: A Homesteading Game
description: A story-driven Survival/ Farm RPG about learning to live after loss. Farm, Forage, Hunt & Craft (on casual or challenge mode) to survive in the deserts of 1860's Oregon. Talk to NPCs & deepen your relationships, upgrade the homestead & explore while you unravel a story about love & tenacity.

name: Autobahn Police Simulator 3
description: Autobahn Police Simulator 3 lets you play as a rookie officer who just resumed their position after a serious car accident left them incapacitated for a while. Work diligently and take on missions to become a capable police officer and keep the autobahn safe.

name: AI: The Somnium Files - Nirvana Initiative
description: Newly-appointed Special Agent Mizuki and her AI partner Aiba are tasked to solve the bizarre Half Body serial killings in this sequel to the critically acclaimed AI: The Somnium Files.

name: Fake Racing
description: Indie racing features on-the-fly generated challenges, fake car physics for fun casual playing and custom 1-bit 3D pixel-perfect dithering visual style.

name: Disney Mirrorverse
description: Unite your team of Disney and Pixar guardians – empowered like never before – to defend the Mirrorverse from unrelenting dark forces in this action RPG.

name: Blade Runner: Enhanced Edition
description:
Blade Runner is an adventure game with an emphasis on detective work rather than on puzzles. There are very few "real" puzzles in the game, and the gameplay mainly consists of questioning suspects, gathering evidence, etc. There are also some action sequences, and throughout the game the protagonist has the ability to use his gun. The player's decisions can (and will) influence the outcome of the story, bringing the game to one of the six possible endings.

Blade Runner: Enhanced Edition will feature updated character models and animations, upscaled cutscenes using machine learning algorithms, widescreen resolution support, keyboard and controller customization, and much more.

name: Gordian Quest
description: An epic roguelike / lite that combines the best elements of deckbuilding, tactical combat and strategic decision-making. Lead and manage heroes on gruelling missions. Forge bonds and discover new skills among them. Unravel curses laid upon the lands and defeat the ultimate evil at the heart of it all.

name: Steve Jackson's Sorcery!: The Complete Collection
description: An epic adventure through a land of monsters, traps and magic, where every decision is yours and every choice is remembered. A narrative created from tens of thousands of choices. Battle strange creatures. Cast weird and wonderful spells. Discovers secrets in every corner of an open world.

name: Baby Kaizo World 2
description: A sequel to Baby Kaizo World by Nowieso

name: Resident Evil: Director's Cut
description:
Experience Resident Evil Director’s Cut originally released on the PlayStation console, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

The iconic Spencer Mansion is the setting for deadly traps, dangerous creatures and horrifying mysteries. Will you make it to the end? Enter the survival horror that started it all.

name: Highline Volleyball VR
description:
Get ready to play volleyball in stunning locations at various times of day.
On the beach, in a stadium arena facing crowds, and more.
Improve your volleyball abilities and tactics through virtual reality and lifelike interactions.

name: No Other Cure
description: Sin descripción

name: Paw Patrol To The Rescue! Learning Video Game
description: Drive, fly and run through games like a big kid to avoid obstacles and solve problems with Chase, Skye and Marshall. Search for the right shape to repair vehicles with Rocky and Tracker and match Rubble's dance moves with his outfits. Pick up Pup Treats in every mission to earn gold stars. Collect all the gold stars to become an honorary member of Paw Patrol!

name: One Night in Kawami
description: Meet a new friend in the dreamlike City of Rivers. One Night in Kawami is a short visual novel about meeting new friends in an unknown city and possibly reshaping reality as you thought you knew it.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: The Isle of Dread
description: The Isle of Dread expansion for Dungeons & Dragons Online, also known as Update 55. The expansion is built around a beloved classic D&D adventure and features an increased level cap, a new playable race, new character-building options, monsters, and more.

name: WCCW 64
description: Sin descripción

name: Pocket Puzzle
description: A puzzle game about fix factory tracks and assembling a pocket game.

name: Angle
description:
Guess the Angle in 4 guesses or less!

Each time you make a guess it will tell you how close you are and which direction to go.

name: Mushroom Musume
description:
Once upon a time, a lonesome Recluse wished for a daughter. A wandering witch overheard their wish, and instead granted them a pot of dirt with a strange, fungal, creature growing within. Play the role of the Recluse as you grow your adoptive child, and discover what kind of person (er, mushroom?) she will become.

Mushroom Musume is a text based life simulation game inspired by titles such as Princess Maker 2 and Alter Ego.

name: Chernobylite: Season 2 - Red Trees
description: Dive into the free Red Trees update, presenting 6 new story missions with Tatyana as a narrator and more. Take on the VR Games roguelike-inspired challenge and face enemies in the fractal world with your equipment and skills assigned randomly. In addition, you can now improve your base with a post-soviet gaming station (cosmetic item).

name: Bloodline: Heroes of Lithas
description:
The World of Lithas is waiting for you. Become the next High Guardian, leader of the City of Light, and embark on an epic journey through the realm of Lithas. A fantasy world with diverse cultures and races; meet clans of lycans, demons, demi-gods, elves, orcs, and dozens more. Unite them together on your campaign, bringing them to your side as powerful champions on the battlefield. But that’s not all, forge deeper relationships, courting them as Companions, to unite your bloodlines and raise new and more powerful Champions, a new generation of heirs to fight alongside you.
The seeds of chaos have spread throughout the land, shattering and dividing the clans apart, and it will be the work of many generations of Champions to restore peace and order. You possess the Bloodline of the Ancient High Guardians, and you alone, with courage and strength, will be able to command these forces, both present and future to victory.

The world of Lithas is filled with fantasy races of every kind. How you relate to them will ultimately determine the future of the world. Explore their territories and cultures, find their stories, interact with them, and even engage in Romance. The choice is yours!

Through careful cultivation of their Bloodlines, you will determine the unique strengths, traits, and skills of the next generation of heroes. Decisions of both nature and nurture will determine their future and your success. Each of your Champions and Companions will bring their own distinct characteristics to pass down to the next generation. Through your efforts, you will forge new Bloodlines of immense power and skill!

Take on the mantle of High Guardian, and lead Luxis, the ancient City of Light, back to greatness. As you expand and rebuild, you’ll unlock more and more features of your city and new avenues of commerce and growth. Allocate your resources and handle the political affairs of your city wisely, and your city will thrive. As you grow, your Champions and heirs will assist you in growing your city, bringing their own unique skills to bear in managing your city. Only by working together will you bring prosperity back to the City of Light!

You will accomplish great deeds in your journeys through Lithas, and your Clan showroom will mark the achievements you’ve made in your progress! The annals of your Clan will record how you’ve built the strongest combat teams, developed a thriving city, found love with many different Companions, and passed down your bloodline to a legion of new heirs. Each of your deeds will bring honor and glory to your Clan!

From the long shadows of an ancient war, the threat of the Darkness has returned to the world just as the strength of the Goddess of Light has weakened. You must engage in thrilling Raids to fight back the tide of darkness and evil with your chosen champions! In your expeditions, you and your companions will soon discover ancient secrets, long hidden, that threaten to shake the very foundations of the world.

name: Open Day
description: A comical Israeli game (in Hebrew) with puzzles, battles, funny characters, and surprises. Visit a crazy academic institution with crazy lecturers, crazy technology, cats, and singing pastries! Be careful, beneath the surface is a years-old conspiracy... Will you make it out alive?

name: Mushroom Musical
description: A colorful rhythm platformer game.

name: Control Room Alpha
description: It's your first day on the job as a crane operator, in a dodgy underground science facility. Your supervisor will show you the ropes. Oh and by the way, I hope you didn't lie on your resume regarding the fact that you're not scared of spiders.

name: Addled
description: Classic puzzling with some new twists

name: SoyMilk Runner
description: Game based on SoyMilk streamer and her friends.

name: Him & Her Collection
description: Him & Her Collection brings three games of the challenging puzzle-platformer series, Him & Her, Her Challenges and Him & Her 3. The player gets to control Him, a guy who got split apart from his partner in this ever changing scenario, through his journe…

name: Call of Duty: Vanguard - Season Four
description: It’s a race for the riches as warring Mercenaries of Fortune fight for the ultimate score.

name: 30 Days in Red Army
description: 30 Days in Red Army is a simple text RPG with pixelated graphic and randomized events and results.

name: Firegirl: Hack 'n Splash Rescue DX
description: Take on the role of a young rescue officer starting her career. Armed with a trusty axe and high-pressure fire hose that also acts as a jetpack, Firegirl responds to emergency calls across the city.

name: Collapse Relapse
description: Explore and collect upgrades before the timeloop resets! Collapse Relapse is a 2D platformer where you have to think and plan out your route in order to be able to escape in time, with secrets galore!

name: Drunken Fist 2: Zombie Hangover
description: The inebriated antics of Drunken Fist are back with brutal vengeance as you take the role of a hungover rocker in Drunken Fist 2: Zombie Hangover! Waking up in a city full of undead hordes, it’s your job to stumble through the streets pummeling zombie op…

name: Shadow of Asha
description: Asha's shadows are invading and corrupting Narkian. It's up to you to stop her!, level up, explore the village for resources and become stronger.

name: Puzzle World: Cute Monsters
description: Welcome to the game "Puzzle world - cute monsters". Here you will find exciting conundrums in the form of puzzles. You have to combine many different fragments together, while creating a whole picture. Dive into the fascinating world of cute monsters! Don't stop at one - collect them all!

name: Vactics
description: Build your mech to fight against the robotic Vactics. Each time you play the game will assemble a new randomised Solitude City to liberate in tactical combat.

name: Santo Island Incident
description: Overgrowth took over the whole Santo Island and facility as a result of an unknown incident. Your mission is to find out the source of the incident and solve what's happened at Santo Island.

name: Vortex
description: In the heart of the Centraus V Galaxy a war has broken out as The Aldari Collective reaches to seize the galaxy by the throat. You fight as one of the Dovan Initiatives lead mercenary's. Out gunned and out maneuvered now only your skills as a pilot can save you as you enter a new world of war.

name: Outmode
description: Outmode is an arcade racer heavily inspired by the Outrun aesthetic movement of the early 2010s. Featuring a retro-futuristic neon setting of beaches, cities and highways; experience the '80s again like never before and take the wheel of a legendary pop culture inspired car, get up close and personal to your rivals and become the driver you always dreamed you could be.

name: Tenko's Magical Sword Quest
description: Upbeat precision platformer, with energized photons to reach a super charged state. Take yourself on a tremendous journey to collect all the magical stone pieces.

name: DopeMine Arena
description: DopeMine Arena is a Bullet-Heaven Roguelite. Simple controls and auto-firing weapons put the focus on levelling up and making good choices to survive the onslaught of enemies. Earn coins to increase the stats of your characters. Discover the weapons and items that pair together .

name: Yonder World: Interview with the Void
description: A psychological horror story, with a spiking sense of danger and gentle melancholy. An out of this world adventure, revolving around books, memories and mortality. Along the way, perhaps you shall pick up pieces of a long forgotten heart, or some unlikely companions that you never knew you needed.

name: Celestial Project
description: "Celestial Project" is a Roguelike WarChess game. It is the first game of the story "Celestial". Command the special operations forces, resist and study unknown alien creatures from space, defend the five star ship civilization spacecraft under construction on earth, and retain human kindling!

name: Freedom's Eye
description: You have found yourself within this god forsaken prison. The people around you don't seem human... They don't look good or trustworthy... But you share the same goal ,Freedom.

name: Last Days of Lazarus
description: After their mother's suicide, Lazarus returns home to his sister Lyudmila. But unexplained events make the world and even reality collapse around him. Looming death, a spreading malediction and the supernatural threaten his sanity, yet Lazarus pushes forward to find the truth about his family.

name: Sonic Origins
description:
Celebrate the games that started it all. Sonic Origins is a brand new collection including Sonic the Hedgehog, Sonic CD, Sonic the Hedgehog 2, and Sonic 3 & Knuckles. Play as Sonic, Tails, & Knuckles and immerse yourself in the fully remastered gameplay, tie the games together with all new animations, explore added features, modes, and more.

The versions of Sonic the Hedgehog, Sonic the Hedgehog 2 and Sonic CD in this compilation are ports of the remasters previously released for mobile, platforms, with the added Drop Dash ability from Sonic Mania.
The Sonic the Hedgehog 3 & Knuckles version is brand new for this compilation, and is also a remaster in the same way that the other titles, also adding the Drop Dash ability. This version had part of its soundtrack changed, swapping the songs for those present in the PC port of the Sonic & Knuckles Collection.

name: PolyCore Defense
description: PolyCore Defense is a tower defense game where you have to raise your defenses in order to defend your core. Build unique turrets, upgrade them with special effects and use abilities to survive waves of enemies that are trying to destroy your core!

name: NonStories: Eien no Hakoniwa
description:
This is an event-based RPG.
It is a dark fantasy RPG with the content of an ensemble drama through conversation.
In short, it is an orthodox RPG in which everyone defeats the enemies that stand in their way while advancing through the events.
This is the first full-length RPG with an emphasis on scenarios in our game.

The difficulty level is high, and it is an unreasonable game in its own way.
We do not expect everyone to clear the game at all.
However, if you can complete a typical RPG just to reach one ending, I think you can go for it.

There are many long events, so it is not for those who want to operate quickly.
It is for those who want to proceed slowly and steadily. It is also for those who are not satisfied with a half-lengthy story.
However, I think it is not suitable for perfectionists.

name: Picovania
description: A demake of Castlevania in PICO-8

name: Death Inn Ⅱ :The Immortal Is Coming
description: Death Inn Ⅱ: The Immortal Is Coming is a horror puzzle. The film crew is in a castle to finish, What is the mystery behind the mysterious death of a leading actress in a castle? Was it a homicide or was there more to it? It's a foggy castle, but none of the truth is buried forever.

name: A Wolf In Sheep's Clothing
description: A Wolf In Sheep's Clothing is a murder-mystery visual novel that takes place in a French high school. You play as Mercredi, an aloof teenage girl who finds that her life is quickly and continuously going awry when your friend goes missing.

name: Amelia Watson Case File no.420
description: Finding the answer is about asking the right question.

name: Fall Guys: Starter Pack
description: New to the Blunderdome? Grab two delectable costumes and 1000 Show-Bucks to start in style!

name: Payday 2: Midland Ranch Heist
description: The Payday Gang head to Texas to complete a job for Gemma McShay.

name: GRID Legends: Valentin’s Classic Car-Nage
description: Buckle up and prepare for adrenaline-fueled chaos as Demo Derby-style game mode Classic Car-Nage smashes its way into GRID Legends to rewrite every racing rule. Join Valentin Manzi, played by Ncuti Gatwa, to cause havoc and bash bumpers with your nemesis in GRID Legends’ epic, new game mode. With the pack’s 8 new Story Experiences, 5 eclectic new Vehicles, 4 new Tracks and 3 fresh Career Events, you’ll have all you need to claim bragging rights and cause optimum carnage.

name: The True Ingredients
description:
The True Ingredients is a horror game that is a goofy twist on SpongeBob SquarePants, trapping an unsuspecting customer in the disturbing bowels of the restaurant being hunted by the titular fry cook.

In the game, the player visits the (legally distinct) Krunchy Kans restaurant to try one of their famed human patty burgers. Unfortunately, the visitor is unable to pay for their $87.99 meal and is hauled down to the depths of the Krunchy Kans to be imprisoned with others that have incurred the wrath of the owner.

name: Kaiju Princess
description: Living with a mysterious invader from outer space... who controls horrifying kaijus! (but she's pretty lazy).

name: Golf With Your Friends: Summer Party Pack
description: Have fun in the sun with the Summer Party Cosmetics Pack

name: Under Maintenance
description: After a rough day at work, all you want to do is settle in with your favorite otome game, only to realize it's gone down for maintenance. How will you pass these troubling times? Risk going to a watering hole to drown your sorrows in a beverage of choice? Begrudgingly scroll through a dating app to meet your love for the night? Either way - adventure, shenanigans, and hot singles in your area await! Disclaimer: heartache probable - choose wisely.

name: Shapik: The Quest
description: This is a story of Shapik, traveling through magic forest in search of his missing sister. Explore a beautiful world, full of mystery, magic and danger and find your missing sister, solving puzzles on your way.

name: Wreckfest: Vehicle Bundle 2
description: The Wreckfest: Vehicle Bundle 2 includes new vehicles to the game.

name: Wreckfest: Vehicle Bundle 1
description: Wreckfest: Vehicle Bundle 1 includes 20 new vehicles, 20 roof decorations, and car customisation packs with new armour, rims, and more.

name: Planet Zoo: Conservation Pack
description: Introducing the Planet Zoo: Conservation Pack! Learn about the critical role zoos take in helping the planet as you expand your own zoo with five endangered animals: Przewalski’s horse, amur leopard, scimitar-horned oryx, siamang, and axolotl.

name: Sexy Sharks
description: Short Adult-Only Visual Novel featuring 3 shark girls on the beach with different personalities and fetishes.

name: Can You Escape Grand Canyon
description:
Shining rock surfaces, rays of sunlight pouring down
A mansion nestled in the Grand Canyon's majestic landscapes, with a riddle to solve.
Will you be able to collect the hidden clues and escape from the mansion?

Enjoy a relaxing time surrounded by rocks and greenery.

name: Mindfulness Simulator: ASMR Meditation Game
description: Wander freely through the forest as your own Ego or as a Stone. Explore the procedurally-generated environment listening to Alan Watts' teachings about Mindfulness, Meditation, Peace and Happiness. Play with ASMR Grass when you roll over it with varying weather and time of day. Just be mindful.

name: Forward Winds
description:
Go on an adventure to vanquish the encroaching darkness.
Defeat monsters to get stronger and advance further.

name: Hide & Chick
description: Sin descripción

name: Wars Across the World: Eunus 133
description: Eunus 133 B.C. is the story of the first slave war. The slaves of Sicily revolt and massacre the great landowners, trying to seize the whole island and to contaminate other areas of the Roman republic. The Roman armies must imperatively destroy the whole of the rebels or calm the revolt.

name: Hidden Battle Top-Down 3D
description: Find the objects that are hidden on the map.

name: Greed
description: Greed is a roguelite game that invites you to wield multiples weapons and unique spells as you fight unknown enemies through challenging environments.

name: The Lobster Game
description: "The Lobster Game" is a roguelike pixel-art styled action shooter. Break through as many levels as you can, killing bandits to avenge brother death.

name: Lay
description: Immerse yourself in this adventure of poetic and contemplative exploration as Elise, a young explorer full of energy. This mysterious world awaits you to overflow with colour and life !

name: Golf With Your Friends: Bouncy Castle Course
description: Master the colourful hazards of the new Bouncy Castle Course Pack

name: Krypt
description: Krypt is an old-school text adventure filled with excitement and peril. Fight monsters, make choices, and travel through forests and mountains to defeat the evil King Krypt in this epic fantasy tale. But watch out as you try to discover all the paths, because not every choice ends in victory.

name: Futanari Sex: The Birthday Massage
description: An explicit erotic visual novel about a sexy young woman treating herself with a very expensive massage for her birthday. But when she finds out her masseuse has a cock hiding in her pants, she can’t help herself and asks for a happy ending instead of a happy birthday.

name: Tiny Robo Puzzles
description: Tiny Robo Puzzles Contains 4 Tiny Sokoban Style Puzzle Games that you can enjoy!

name: Dorfs: Hammers for Hire
description: A co-op crafting platformer where your friends prove worse than any enemy. Craft weapons and armor from your dwarven workshop, help your patron's army win the battle, and make your way up the Iron Mountain!

name: Lord of Darkness: Prologue
description: Lord of Darkness: Prologue is a fantasy game made in pixel-based graphics, just like in the good old days of the early dawn of Japanese rpg. An epic adventure full of dangers and hardships awaits you.

name: Atria
description: Fight and survive against Assault droids and Sirens in an attempt to defeat the corrupt conglomerate known as Koretech and save the galaxy.

name: Dune Strider
description: Dune Strider is an Adventure-Strategy Game in which you, the player, take command of a merchant controlling a Sand-Barge in a desert and use it to travel and explore the land around you. The road to settlements to sell your goods is filled with dangers and opportunities.

name: Pistola
description: Kill a lot of enemies on screen with the help of your gun and upgrades. Explore insane builds and try to get into the global ranking!

name: Farming Simulator 19: Ambassador Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Fall Guys: Season 1 - Free for All
description: Welcome to Fall Guys: Season 1 - Free for All! You're invited to dive and dodge your way to victory in the pantheon of clumsy. Rookie or pro? Solo or partied up? Fall Guys delivers ever-evolving, high-concentrated hilarity and fun!

name: Cool Animals
description: Cool Animals is a fun and challenging puzzle game. With it, you'll have to use your various skills to be able to overcome the challenges that exist in each level.

name: Grim Horde
description: Gather your minions, conquer the lands and become the Darklord! Grim Horde is a fast arcade game with rogue-lite elements, where you lead your armies through the lands of the mortals, raze villages and claim souls. Die and rise again from your ashes and learn new summoning spells.

name: Rail Route: The Story of Jozic
description: A stand-alone prequel from the developers of Rail Route, The Story of Jozic thrusts players into the world of an apprentice train dispatcher in the bustling city of Prague, guided through the process of creating their first rail network by a mysterious mentor.

name: Dashing Orange
description: A 2D precision platformer about a little Orange that can dash and jump around this abstract world to avoid all the traps in the way to reach you goal.

name: OneShotRogue
description: Deck-building roguelike Use cards to reduce the enemy's HP to just 0. This is an easy battle because all battles are over in one turn.

name: Ghosts of Hollow Creek
description: A fantasy story-rich turn-based RPG with customizable characters and romantic interest.

name: Havsala: Into the Soul Palace
description: Havsala is an investigative puzzle game with a rich storytelling in which you try to pinpoint times and places where the Soul Palace visitors live using diaries, books, paintings and many other clues.

name: The Paper Game
description: A game about tearing paper, cutting stickers, avoiding Goobles, and unlocking the greatest paper puns you've never

name: Fadry
description: Fadry is a linear, story-focused game which explores a meticulously crafted dark fantasy world through the eyes of several different characters.

name: Mago
description: Mago is a 2D platformer that puts us in the boots of a sorcerer who will have to run, jump and use his trustworthy magic wand across a vast kingdom where everything can, and will, happen. Will the Wizard be able to rescue his beloved damsel from the claws of the evil Gourmet?

name: Good Company
description: In Good Company you pursue your vision of designing unique high-tech goods and become a hands-on tycoon. Develop a management system that handles production, logistics, and research for you, while you forge your enterprise from a garage startup to a global market leader.

name: Chroma
description: Sin descripción

name: Monster of the Weekend
description: Monster of the Weekend is a short, lighthearted adventure/virtual pet game, where what you feed to your little monster will determine how it grows and changes.

name: Bout
description: Tap in the arrows on the screen as fast as possible to win.

name: BiblioMania
description: BiblioMania is a multiplayer 2D platformer where you are a clerk in a cursed library. Work with (or triumph over) up to 3 friends while taking in and renting out books to many clients. But beware the events that happen at the library, they can change everything.

name: Wordland: Let's Travel
description: Must-visit places in the world! Test your knowledge about places and monuments around the world, arrange the pieces and discover the words.

name: Green Diver
description: This is a hidden object game in which you have to dive to the bottom of the ocean. Explore the psychedelic depths, become a participant in amazing adventures, but don't forget to come back up!

name: Cat Lovescapes
description: Sneak Black cat through the house and help him reach his forbidden love!

name: Space Rescue
description: Space Rescue is a special space adventure game.You will navigate a tiny spaceship to slip into the puzzle where the Energy Spinels hidden. They have to glide up and down, avoiding a series of obstrucles, and eventually carry the Spinels back to their mother planet.

name: Lightworkers
description: A 2D Visual Nove Adventure.

name: Futanari Sex: Naughty Massage
description: A visual novel about a couple trying to release tension and increase their sexual pleasure. Not knowing where to start and eager to know all the secrets of erotic massage, they turn to a specialist.

name: Watch Your Back
description: You are some small-time journalists, exploited by your boss. When an abandoned Cold War-era shelter is discovered, your boss sends you there to do the story of a lifetime. Only you two will know what awaits you in there...

name: Platformity
description: A 2D puzzle platformer that combines puzzle solving elements with speedrunning challenges. Game features multiple obstacles with ever increasing difficulty.

name: Hands of Necromancy
description: Hands of Necromancy is a Dark Fantasy First Person Shooter and metroidvania game, similar to Heretic, made with the GZDoom engine. Find your weapons, fight evil forces, use the special abilities of special transformations to find your path! Show how powerful you are as a Necromancer!

name: Inside the Backrooms
description: You fell Inside the Backrooms and your only objective is to find an exit. But it won't be easy, there are a lot of puzzles to solve and strange entities to survive...

name: Paranormal Organization: Magic Academy
description: This is an EDU game, you can call excellent witch as your students, give them single course, multi-course, improve their magic level, you can go to alchemy workshop to refine magic tools, when the witch strength is enough, challenge higher magic level, sorcerer, magic king, supreme god.

name: HyperNova
description: A 2D side-scrolling shooter in which you advance by defeating enemies in a world where everything is made of voxels. Defeat enemies, collect reinforcement items, and take on powerful enemies that appear one after another!

name: Click and Collect
description: Serve your customers as efficiently as possible to maintain your reputation as the best darn store keeper around in this frantic, time and resource management, strategy, arcade action game.

name: Aqua Populo
description: Pilot your sub through waves of angry sea-life and punishing bosses in this aquatic twin-stick shooter.

name: New Year's Eve Miracle
description: This is a short cute visual novel about New Year's magic, friendship and miracles.

name: Platformory
description: Platformory is a 2D platformer with minimalistic graphics, in which you not only have to prove your platforming but also your memory skills.

name: Dark Hood
description: 2D Platformer. Combination of cyberpunk and magic.

name: Visionarium 2: The Descent
description: Visionarium 2 is a psychedelic audio-visualizer. Enter this artistic VR experience that takes you on an immersive journey through the underworld. Come out on the other side transformed, in awe.

name: Meet me at Noon
description: Meet me at NooN is a cozy puzzle game with brain-scratching time-loop mechanics. Control two spirits that create time loops each day, learn their different behaviors, how they can interact with each other and how these interactions are interfering with their time loops.

name: Little Inner Monsters
description: Do you know your Little Inner Monsters? These are the different feelings we deal with on a daily basis. Play with them in this card game and bring your own little monster grove to life. Play against the computer or a friend.

name: Bewildered
description: Bewildered is a Platforming-Adventure game where you form a friendship with a peculiar monster as you go about solving a mystery of what brought upon the endless night to the mysterious island. Learn to trust and help each other face obstacles and fears, as you make it through a vibrant world.

name: 25°N 71°W
description: Bermuda Triangle, 2023: An airplane is on its way to America. Suddenly the engines fail. At the end of the day there's a lone survivor: you, stranded on a desert island. Welcome to 25°N 71°W - a survival game where you have to mine, craft and build - to survive somehow!

name: Kuukiyomi: Consider It! Online
description: One, two, all together. Now KUUKIYOMI with everyone in the world.
